Job Description
		        Summary of the Role:The Website Design and Creative Specialist serves as the creative expert for Enspire for Enterprise. The primary role is the strategy, UX, and design of high-value custom client websites on WordPress and proprietary platforms. This includes understanding our clients brand and website objectives to create a visually appealing website that also functions well for SEO best practices. In addition, the Website Design and Creative Specialist will create creative ads for clients' advertising.The secondary objective of this role will be applying his or her skills and knowledge in the development, execution, and delivery of outstanding creative content for a variety of audiences and media. He or she will lead the development, promotion, and protection of the Enspire for Enterprise brand. This creative will provide creative direction and quality control for digital, website, social media, photo, print, and video strategy and assets.The ideal candidate is not only a strong website designer and creative thought leader, but he or she will also lead and participate in a collaborative creative process partnering with multiple teams (i.e., Project Managers, Developers, Sales Directors, and more), as well as manage a high volume of work while navigating shifting priorities of various partners. The designer must bring a creative mindset, excellent communication skills, strong planning, project, and resource management skills, and a flexible, solutions-oriented approach to ensure consistently superior work. Enthusiastic and knowledgeable, the candidate craves keeping up with design trends and jumping into learning new processes and skills as needed.What Experience You Bring: Expert at design systems, color theory, website storyboards, UX, knowledge of how to manage and operate a webflow CMS Experience in large website creation, understanding best practices of usability and website conversion (UX/UI) in website programs, including WordPress Expert-level experience with Adobe Creative Cloud Bachelors degree in graphic design, digital design, graphic communications, or relevant experience 5  years' experience shown with a portfolio in graphic arts, web design, digital/interactive design, and project management in a deadline-driven environment Knowledge of InVision App or equivalent Must possess excellent time management skills and can manage multiple projects simultaneously, set priorities, and meet deadlines Experience managing integrated marketing projects and digital asset and project management systems (Monday.com, Atlassian Jira, and Confluence experience encouraged) Must be proactive, self-directed, and results-oriented, with the ability to define and execute projects independently Positive attitude, enthusiastic brand champion, open to constructive feedback both internally and from clients externally, and a team player Strong conceptual and problem-solving skills regarding both online and offline communication solutions (branding, messaging, marketing, design, typography, photography, animation, video, audio, and programming) Possess sound judgment and a good understanding of visual storytelling; Requires superior communication skills (interpersonal, verbal, and written) Experience working with external vendors and ability to match the appropriate skills to projects, including photography and designResponsibilities: Leads senior-level client creative discussions on the creative strategy, design, layout, and functionality of their new website Completes the creative brief and helps clients make creative decisions to drive a design of a website that represents their brand but also functions for conversion. Develops website site maps and mock-ups for multi-location customers, running tests for layouts and features. Owns entire end-to-end website design process, including working with new and potential clients as well as modifying existing client websites in WordPress and our proprietary website platform Creates rough sketches, wireframe layouts, and high-fidelity mockups that visualize concepts and provide an accurate, graphical user interface representation Maintains brand consistency throughout all projects Stays up-to-date with industry developments and tools, competitive and complementary products, and experiences Produces graphics for trade shows, from tabletop signage to booth graphics to highlight our brand and encourage conversion Provides creative direction for Enspire-wide projects. Conceptualizes and produces the production of a wide range of projects (print and digital) Serves as a brand strategist to maintain brand guidelines and design best practices; Ensures guidelines and usage are in line with policy and legal compliance Successful cross-team collaboration toward mutual goals (website development, advertising fulfillment, copywriting) Develops firm grasp of prospect and customer audience; Leverages brand research and audience insights to identify, develop, strengthen, and evolve creative assets across platforms Owns the visual message for customer-facing PowerPoint presentations, including RFPs Possess great attention to detail and offer quality control reviews for design work Possesses strong organizational skills; able to oversee the effective execution of numerous projects Collaborates with individuals from different creative disciplines and team members of all levels

Job Description
Job Title: Client Servicing Associate - Advertising Agency
Location: Hyderabad
Job Type: Full-time
Experience: 2-3 years in an Advertising Agency is must.
We are seeking a dedicated and enthusiastic Client Servicing Associate to join our esteemed advertising agency. As a Client Servicing Associate, you will be responsible for providing exceptional service to our clients and ensuring their satisfaction throughout their engagement with us.
Responsibilities:
- Act as the primary point of contact for clients, understanding their needs and objectives
- Build and nurture strong relationships with new and existing clients
- Collaborate with internal teams to develop and execute effective advertising strategies, ensuring timely delivery of projects and campaigns and meeting client expectations.
- Seek feedback from clients to improve our services and enhance client satisfaction
- Coordinate with creative and production teams to ensure seamless project execution
Qualifications:
- Minimum 2-3 years of experience in client servicing within an Advertising Agency is mandatory
- Strong understanding of the advertising industry and client management, excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to build and maintain strong client relationships, proactive problem solving and conflict resolution abilities.
- Proficient in project management and multitasking
If you are a dedicated and customer-centric professional with a passion for client servicing and advertising, we invite you to join our team. Together, we will deliver exceptional service and contribute to the success of our clients in the competitive advertising industry.
Role:: Advertising - Account Manager/ Client Servicing Manager

Job Description

Job Description

Urgent Requirements for Ground Staff, Immigration and Ticketing Executive

DESIGNATIONS:-

Custom Officer

Immigration

Customer Service

Airport Engineer

Ground Staff

Ticketing Executive

Airport Security Officer

Airport Manager

Air Traffic Controller

Aircraft Maintenance

We are seeking for energetic staff to be responsible for administrative duties and communication with passengers. You should be able to promptly resolve passenger queries and ensure that all passengers are satisfied.

To be successful as staff, you should display outstanding interpersonal skills and achieve excellent customer service, which consistently meets the goals and vision. Ultimately, outstanding staff should be able to multi-task and ensure that every passenger is comfortable, aircraft delays, weather concerns and other factors that may affect passengers.

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:-

Excellent customer service skills.

Strong work ethic.

Ability to work in a team oriented environment.

Ability to type and use a computer keyboard with sufficient speed to meet the requirements of the role.

Able to understand documents, learn and follow ticketing procedures, and other rules and regulations.

Able to communicate information and instructions verbally and/or via radio equipment.

Able to communicate effectively in a professional manner.

Strong leadership qualities and ability to create a passionate and efficient workforce.

Able to effectively resolve employee conflicts.

Ability to apply creative solutions that have a positive impact on results.

Work Schedule:-

You will need to have flexibility to work a variety of shifts, including nights, weekends, holidays and overtime. We operate in a shift bid environment.

Eligibility Criteria:

1. Educational Qualification: According to the job profile qualification require from a Recognized Board or University.

2. If at any stage prior to or during the Employment of Candidate, it is found that the requisite qualification is not completed from a Recognized Board or University as determined, such candidates Offer for Employment or Employment is liable to be withdrawn or terminated.

3. Desired Skills: Good Communication Skills, Customer Service Aptitude.

4. Airport Operations Experience Preferred.

5. No Visible Tattoo marks (if have should be covered)/ body art

6. Age: 18 to 45 Years

7. Interviewed Candidates can reapply after 6 months

Salary:

The below components that form part of the Income/Earnings side of the salary statement are:-

Basic Salary

Dearness Allowance

House Rent Allowance

Conveyance Allowance

Medical Allowance

Special Allowance

The below components that form part of the Deductions side of the salary statement are:

Professional Tax

Tax Deducted at Source

Employee Provident Fund

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Quality Engineer Job Responsibilities
Determines quality improvement parameters by identifying statistical methods relevant to manufacturing processes.
Establishes statistical confidence by identifying sample size and acceptable error, and determining levels of confidence.
Develops experiments by applying full and fractional factorial techniques.
Develops sampling plans by applying attribute, variable, and sequential sampling methods.
Maintains statistical process controls by applying demerit/unit, zone charting, x2 charts for distributions and individual-medial/range for multistream processes.
Analyzes data by completing hypothesis, normal distribution, and process capability analysis tests.
Prepares reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing data; and making recommendations.
Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications, establishing personal networks, benchmarking state-of-the-art practices, participating in professional societies, and maintaining ASQ-certified quality engineer qualification.
Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Ensures products adhere to company and industry quality standards.
Brainstorms ideas to create solutions for identified problems.
Specialization:: Quality Assurance,Quality Control,Quality Inspection,Statistical Quality Control

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
		        Role OverviewTechnical Artist (TA) acts as a bridge between the artists and programmers working on a game. You will be reporting to Art Director. They ensure art assets can be easily integrated into a game without sacrificing the artistic vision or exceeding the technical limits of the chosen platform. The Technical Artist coordinates with the lead artists and the art director, and with the lead programmers. The main responsibilities include setting up and maintaining the art production workflow and making decisions about art packages and tools. Investigate new techniques and implementing them within the team. The job often includes an instructional element, with the Technical Artist sharing their knowledge with other artists by mentoring sessions. The Technical Artist typically works one step removed from the direct creation of game art assets, setting up the systems of production and solving problems as they arise. Its crucial for the Technical Artist to keep up to date in changes in technology, both regarding mobile hardware, art packages, and new techniques. The Technical Artist will create custom tools to improve the efficiency of their team. This is usually carried out using the scripting languages included in the main modeling and animation packages.ResponsibilitiesMaintain technologies and art workflows.Identify art workflow problems, and work with Technical Directors, SMEs, and TAs to solve them.Establish and enforce naming conventions within assets, tools, and workflowsIntegrate new technologies (internal and external) into art workflows.Work with other artists/TA's on a daily basis to identify challenges and provide solutions.Accountable for asset and meeting budget (memory and performance).Accountable for asset build stability.ExperienceAt least 7-8 years of games/animation/FX production experience.Intermediate knowledge of CG fundamentals: modeling, texturing/shading/surfacing, rigging, animation, lighting, rendering, and compositing.Understanding of multiple gaming platform limitations with regard to visual assets.Advanced understanding of at least one 3D package Maya.Intermediate scripting experience with Python and Mel/Maya API.Proficiency with C# or C  Experience in Unity/Unreal, Maya/Max, PhotoshopExcellent troubleshooting CG issues.To resolve technical challenges and limitations.Willingness and confidence to provide a bridge between artists and software engineers.

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
 


Our company is seeking to hire a skilled software developer to help with the development of our current projects. Your duties will primarily revolve around building software by writing code, as well as modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces. You will also be involved in directing system testing and validation procedures, and also working with customers or departments on technical issues including software system design and maintenance.
To be successful in this role, you will need extensive knowledge of programming languages and the software development life-cycle. A bachelor's degree in computer science or related degree is required.
Software Developer Responsibilities:

Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces.
Directing system testing and validation procedures.
Directing software programming and documentation development.
Consulting with departments or customers on project status and proposals.
Working with customers or departments on technical issues including software system design and maintenance.
Analyzing information to recommend and plan the installation of new systems or modifications of an existing system.
Consulting with engineering staff to evaluate software hardware interfaces and develop specifications and performance requirements.
Designing and developing software systems using scientific analysis and mathematical models to predict and measure outcomes and design consequences.
Preparing reports on programming project specifications, activities, or status.
Conferring with project managers to obtain information on limitations or capabilities
Role:: Customer Care Executive/ Associate - Non Voice/ Web, Customer Care Executive/ Associate - Voice, Team Lead - Non Voice/ Web, Customer Service Manager/ Head

Job Description
		        Summary of the Role:The Website Design and Creative Specialist serves as the creative expert for Enspire for Enterprise. The primary role is the strategy, UX, and design of high-value custom client websites on WordPress and proprietary platforms. This includes understanding our clients brand and website objectives to create a visually appealing website that also functions well for SEO best practices. In addition, the Website Design and Creative Specialist will create creative ads for clients' advertising.The secondary objective of this role will be applying his or her skills and knowledge in the development, execution, and delivery of outstanding creative content for a variety of audiences and media. He or she will lead the development, promotion, and protection of the Enspire for Enterprise brand. This creative will provide creative direction and quality control for digital, website, social media, photo, print, and video strategy and assets.The ideal candidate is not only a strong website designer and creative thought leader, but he or she will also lead and participate in a collaborative creative process partnering with multiple teams (i.e., Project Managers, Developers, Sales Directors, and more), as well as manage a high volume of work while navigating shifting priorities of various partners. The designer must bring a creative mindset, excellent communication skills, strong planning, project, and resource management skills, and a flexible, solutions-oriented approach to ensure consistently superior work. Enthusiastic and knowledgeable, the candidate craves keeping up with design trends and jumping into learning new processes and skills as needed.What Experience You Bring: Expert at design systems, color theory, website storyboards, UX, knowledge of how to manage and operate a webflow CMS Experience in large website creation, understanding best practices of usability and website conversion (UX/UI) in website programs, including WordPress Expert-level experience with Adobe Creative Cloud Bachelors degree in graphic design, digital design, graphic communications, or relevant experience 5  years' experience shown with a portfolio in graphic arts, web design, digital/interactive design, and project management in a deadline-driven environment Knowledge of InVision App or equivalent Must possess excellent time management skills and can manage multiple projects simultaneously, set priorities, and meet deadlines Experience managing integrated marketing projects and digital asset and project management systems (Monday.com, Atlassian Jira, and Confluence experience encouraged) Must be proactive, self-directed, and results-oriented, with the ability to define and execute projects independently Positive attitude, enthusiastic brand champion, open to constructive feedback both internally and from clients externally, and a team player Strong conceptual and problem-solving skills regarding both online and offline communication solutions (branding, messaging, marketing, design, typography, photography, animation, video, audio, and programming) Possess sound judgment and a good understanding of visual storytelling; Requires superior communication skills (interpersonal, verbal, and written) Experience working with external vendors and ability to match the appropriate skills to projects, including photography and designResponsibilities: Leads senior-level client creative discussions on the creative strategy, design, layout, and functionality of their new website Completes the creative brief and helps clients make creative decisions to drive a design of a website that represents their brand but also functions for conversion. Develops website site maps and mock-ups for multi-location customers, running tests for layouts and features. Owns entire end-to-end website design process, including working with new and potential clients as well as modifying existing client websites in WordPress and our proprietary website platform Creates rough sketches, wireframe layouts, and high-fidelity mockups that visualize concepts and provide an accurate, graphical user interface representation Maintains brand consistency throughout all projects Stays up-to-date with industry developments and tools, competitive and complementary products, and experiences Produces graphics for trade shows, from tabletop signage to booth graphics to highlight our brand and encourage conversion Provides creative direction for Enspire-wide projects. Conceptualizes and produces the production of a wide range of projects (print and digital) Serves as a brand strategist to maintain brand guidelines and design best practices; Ensures guidelines and usage are in line with policy and legal compliance Successful cross-team collaboration toward mutual goals (website development, advertising fulfillment, copywriting) Develops firm grasp of prospect and customer audience; Leverages brand research and audience insights to identify, develop, strengthen, and evolve creative assets across platforms Owns the visual message for customer-facing PowerPoint presentations, including RFPs Possess great attention to detail and offer quality control reviews for design work Possesses strong organizational skills; able to oversee the effective execution of numerous projects Collaborates with individuals from different creative disciplines and team members of all levels

We are seeking a new graphic designer to join our team. You will be designing a wide variety of things across digital and offline media. To be successful in this position, you’ll be a self-starter, capable of delivering brilliant creative ideas, and show amazing attention to detail.
Graphic Designer Responsibilities:

Planning concepts by studying relevant information and materials.
Illustrating concepts by designing examples of art arrangement, size, type size and style and submitting them for approval.
Preparing finished art by operating necessary equipment and software.
Coordinating with outside agencies, art services, web designer, marketing, printers, and colleagues as necessary.
Contributing to team efforts by accomplishing tasks as needed.
Communicating with clients about layout and design.
Creating a wide range of graphics and layouts for product illustrations, company logos, and websites with software such as photoshop.
Reviewing final layouts and suggesting improvements when necessary.
Role:: Administration Manager, Operations Manager

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
We’re looking for an experienced mechanical engineer to join our organization, which prides itself on offering innovative mechanical solutions to everyday problems. While serving as mentor to the production teams, the mechanical engineer will engage in rigorous design and analysis processes using the most up-to-date technologies and software. The ideal candidate will have experience with an entire product lifecycle, ushering mechanical solutions from research and design to implementation.
Objectives of this role

Analyze mechanical problems and produce innovative solutions using multiple fabrication and material methods, including injection molding, aluminum castings, machined parts, and sheet metal
Oversee product development from design to implementation, monitoring status of all assignments and reporting to senior managers on progress
Evaluate mechanical designs for potential flaws and offer modifications to eliminate them  
Comply with all national and local regulations and maintain organizational values and standards

Responsibilities

Work on projects to sustain a product, involving replacement or redesign of obsolete components, product improvement features, cost reductions, manufacturing support, and field complaints
Prepare assembly or product layout and detailed drawings, and participate in building of prototype product or system
Provide tolerance analyses, apply GD&T (Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing), conduct stress–strain analyses, develop reliability testing procedures, and generate design verification reports
Design methods for testing product capabilities and troubleshooting mechanical or structural flaws
Ensure that design testing, implementation, and maintenance processes are executed according to company quality standards
Participate in regularly scheduled department meetings to report on project status, prepare and give design presentations, and mentor junior engineers

Required skills and qualifications

Four or more years of experience as leader of design and production teams
Working knowledge of core engineering concepts, including mechanics, materials science, and thermodynamics
Working knowledge of analysis tools, such as Ansys and Pro/Mechanica
Proven success in product development and the entirety of a product lifecycle
Strong ability with computer-aided systems, such as CAD, CAM, and CAE

Preferred skills and qualifications

Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in mechanical engineering
Professional licensure, such as PE (Professional Engineer)
Role:: Design Engineer - Mechanical, O&M Engineer - Mechanical, Quality Engineer - Mechanical, Technician/ Foreman - Mechanical

Renardet is searching for a Lead Mechanical Engineerwith some previous experience in the Airport . It is anticipated that the applicant will have at least 9 years total experience in the field of Lead Mechanical Engineer . The requirements of the position are as follows:
• Lead mechanical design activities and assist in cross discipline coordination.

• A team player with the ability to establish good working relationships with clients, line management and project.
• Good technical, analytical and organizational, skills.
• Good knowledge of construction and general application of principles, theories and industry practices and standards
• Flexible approach to work and the ability to prioritize and manage time effectively.
• Strong attention to detail and the ability to make good judgments.

Job Description
Responsibilities
As a mechanical engineer, you'll need to:

research and develop products - for example, mechanical hearts if working in the medical industry
improve production processes - such as those in large oil refineries, or services within buildings
design and implement cost-effective equipment modifications to help improve safety and reliability
develop a project specification with colleagues, often including those from other engineering disciplines
develop and use new materials and technologies
manage people, projects and resources - this will depend on your role
develop, test and evaluate theoretical designs
discuss and solve complex problems with manufacturing departments, sub-contractors, suppliers and customers
make sure a product can be made reliably and will perform consistently in specified operating environments
manage projects using engineering principles and techniques
plan and design new production processes
produce details of specifications and outline designs
recommend modifications following prototype test results
use research, analytical, conceptual and planning skills, particularly those in mathematical modelling and computer-aided design
consider the implications of issues such as cost, safety and time constraints
work with other professionals, within and outside the engineering sector
monitor and commission plant and systems.
Role:: Assembler, Commercial Engineer, Environmental Engineer, Estimation Engineer

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
CAD Engineers, also known as AutoCAD or CADD Engineers (or Operators), use said applications to create technical drawings for industries ranging from electronics to aeronautics. Skills included on sample resumes of CAD Engineers include interpreting drawings to create CAD and CAM data, converting sketches of the project or product into detailed CAD drawings, and editing existing CAD drawings by applying changes according to client specifications. Resumes of CAD Engineers commonly include associate's degrees, though some employers prefer bachelor's degrees in the fields of computer-aided design and engineering.
A CAD engineer is a highly skilled professional whose job entails using computer-aided design software. They need to be experts in applications such as AutoCAD, Pro/ENGINEER and SolidWorks. They have a deep understanding of science, physics, materials, mathematics and engineering principles.
CAD engineers work across many different industries to decide how certain products should be designed and built. They are also responsible for determining if a project is even feasible to accomplish. Their planning process must be thorough so that their designs can be created in real life.
Related: What Is an Engineer?
What does a CAD engineer do?
A CAD engineer is responsible for the following tasks:


Designing project frameworks


Producing detailed construction and design plans for architects and engineers from other disciplines to follow


Collaborating with industrial and packaging engineers to develop, manufacture and market products


Making time and expense estimates on a project basis


Creating two and three-dimensional technical drawings


Designing floor plans, renderings and elevations using computer software


Choosing which materials to use for a product


Overseeing assistant drafters and others involved in a design project


Coding and testing software


Developing procedures and standards for a design team


Finding technical solutions to meet a client's goals


Training and offering support and guidance to their team


Related: Learn About Being a Design Engineer
Salary for CAD engineers
Since many engineering roles require highly skilled professionals, CAD engineering can be a lucrative career. Engineering salaries vary depending on the type of engineering, level of education, years of experience, location and industry.
The national average salary for an engineer is $65,993 per year and may include access to employment benefits, such as paid time off, health insurance, dental insurance, vision insurance, tuition reimbursement, stock ownership and 401(k) and other retirement options. (For the most up-to-date salary information from Indeed, click on the salary link.)
What skills does a CAD engineer need?
CAD engineering is a very technical career that requires both hands-on work and critical thinking. CAD engineers should develop the following skills:


Business savvy: CAD engineers need to create products that are going to sell. It's useful to be able to meet with clients and learn about their goals. You may need to collaborate with them to think of ways to market a new product.


Attention to detail: Engineering is a very detail-oriented profession, so it is important to follow the company's protocol closely to ensure the safety of your team and the end-user.


Communication: Since CAD engineers often work with a team, you will need effective written and verbal communication skills to collaborate with your coworkers. Much of your communication may be through emails, so you need to be able to clearly convey your ideas and plans through text. You might also collaborate with team members in person to discuss projects.


Creativity: Creativity is essential when you are drafting new designs and models. Being able to think creatively while troubleshooting also allows you to bring a fresh perspective for improvements.


Curiosity: Curiosity can fuel your research and desire to learn more about your industry. You need to stay updated on the latest technology trends. Reading consumer and market reports can help you better understand the progress within your industry.


Decision making: When creating models, you need to have the ability to make smart design decisions. Much of what CAD engineers do depends on the wants and needs of a client, so you need to be able to determine which design choices meet those requirements.


Innovation: Creating new designs requires innovative thinking. Engineers are always finding new solutions to everyday problems and working on ways to make things look and operate more effectively.


Leadership: CAD engineers need to effectively delegate work and motivate their team of assistant drafters. Part of the job is to clearly explain new projects to team members and oversee that they complete everything on time.


Problem solving: Creating prototypes and testing them is a large part of a CAD engineer's job. If something isn't working properly, you need to be able to identify problems and find solutions to them.


Technology: Most CAD engineering involves using computer software and programs. You need to know how to use the computer to code, program, design and conduct tests. Updating and maintaining design files is crucial to saving your work, so you need to be skilled in backing up your projects.


Related: 12 Essential Engineering Skills for Your Resume
How to become a CAD engineer
If you are interested in becoming a CAD engineer, be prepared to immerse yourself in math, science and technology. CAD engineers need to be able to apply these subjects to real-life scenarios and projects. Follow these steps to become a qualified CAD engineer:
1. Earn a bachelor's degree
CAD engineers need at least a bachelor's degree in a relevant field of engineering to be qualified for their job. Computer engineering, design engineering, manufacturing engineering, mechanical engineering or product design engineering technology are common types of engineering that CAD engineers study. During your courses, you might learn about machine design, CAD software and manufacturing processes. Many of the projects are hands-on instruction to ensure you can apply engineering concepts to real life.
Employers may also prefer that candidates have master's degrees or doctorates. Choose a master's program that focuses on computer engineering, design engineering or manufacturing engineering. Students interested in research or university teaching jobs tend to choose a doctoral program. Additional education can increase your job opportunities and earning potential as a CAD engineer.
Related: When a Professional Degree Will Help You Advance in Your Career
2. Gain work experience
Many engineering programs have co-op programs where you can gain work experience while also earning class credits. College courses, labs and internships allow you to complete projects and demonstrate your engineering skills. Use your internship as a chance to learn about the daily tasks of a CAD engineer and to create connections. These connections may help you find a full-time engineering position after you graduate.
After you're hired for a full-time job, your employer will likely also provide you with hands-on training. They will teach you about the company's products, services, processes and policies. You may learn more about using specific computer software or programs.
3. Obtain a certification
Since CAD engineers use AutoCAD for a lot of their work, it's useful to get an AutoCAD certification. This shows employers that you know how to use this program with proficiency, which can make you a more qualified candidate. There are three types of AutoCAD certifications: AutoCAD Certifie/

Procurement Engineers are employed by industrial companies and are responsible for purchasing technical products and services needed for manufacturing processes. 
Usual work activities include networking with suppliers and contractors, negotiating procurement agreements, researching the market, choosing suppliers offering competitive prices, and making sure procurement transactions respect legal requirements.

Based on our collection of example resumes, Procurement Engineers come from various educational backgrounds and usually hold a Bachelor's Degree.

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Design Engineer, Mechanical Engineer Job Responsibilities:

Designs mechanical and electromechanical products and systems by developing and testing specifications and methods.
Evaluates mechanical and electromechanical systems and products by designing and conducting research programs and applying principles of mechanics, thermodynamics, hydraulics, heat transfer, and materials.
Confirms system and product capabilities by designing feasibility and testing methods and properties.
Develops mechanical and electromechanical products by studying customer requirements; researching and testing manufacturing and assembly methods and materials; and soliciting observations from operators.
Develops manufacturing processes by designing and modifying equipment for fabricating, building, assembling, and installing components.
Assures system and product quality by designing testing methods; testing finished-product and system capabilities; and confirming fabrication, assembly, and installation processes.
Prepares product reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and trends.
Provides engineering information by answering questions and requests.
Maintains product and company reputation by complying with government regulations.
Keeps equipment operational by coordinating maintenance and repair services; following manufacturers instructions and established procedures; and requesting special services.
Maintains system and product data base by writing computer programs and entering data.
Completes projects by training and guiding technicians.
Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications, establishing personal networks, participating in professional societies.
Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Role:: Design Engineer - Instrumentation, Design Engineer - Mechanical, Draftsman/ Draughtsman - Mechanical, O&M Engineer - Mechanical

		        Job Description:At PAGO Analytics, we wouldn't be the industry leader we are without our successful sales team. We're seeking a qualified sales specialist to help us sell the products and services that help improve the lives of people around the world. Our ideal salesperson has a strong understanding of the sales process and excels at generating leads, building relationships, and closing deals. We're seeking a quick learner with strong listening and negotiating skills, and someone with a presence who can showcase our offerings in a compelling way. Often tasked with giving presentations, attending networking events, and participating in trade shows, it's essential that our salesperson be approachable and professional. Job Description
		        Job Description:At PAGO Analytics, we wouldn't be the industry leader we are without our successful sales team. We're seeking a qualified sales specialist to help us sell the products and services that help improve the lives of people around the world. Our ideal salesperson has a strong understanding of the sales process and excels at generating leads, building relationships, and closing deals. We're seeking a quick learner with strong listening and negotiating skills, and someone with a presence who can showcase our offerings in a compelling way. Often tasked with giving presentations, attending networking events, and participating in trade shows, it's essential that our salesperson be approachable and professional. His or her efforts will help us extend our global reach and impact.Objectives of this Role* Represent our company, with a comprehensive understanding of our offerings* Maximize the sales performance by establishing strong relationships and gaining insight to the needs and lifestyle of the client* Meet weekly, monthly, and annual sales and activity quotas* Generate leads and commit to customer service by building relationships* Adjust sales techniques based on interactions and results in the field* Perform incisive and insightful market and competitive researchDaily and Monthly Responsibilities* Qualify, develop, and maintain thorough company and product knowledge, research consumer needs, and identify how our solutions can meet them* Generate leads and grow existing relationships, maintaining an accurate, detailed client book, and developing an active, repeat customer base* Make cold calls or perform warm outreach, putting outside-the-box thinking to work to develop new and unique sales tactics* Work with the Account Executive team to design industry-specific outbound efforts* Utilize Salesforce.com tool to ensure standard processes during all sales stages* Conduct month-end and year-end close processesKeyskills3-5 years in sales within a sales target revenue of 1M USD yearly settingExcellent communication, interpersonal, telephone, and organizational skillsExperience working with any CRM platformsExperience closing enterprise-level dealsAbility to analyze business opportunities and read situations wellAbility to travel at least 50 PERCENT  of the timePreferred Qualifications :Bachelor's degreeProven success rate at levels above quotasStrong organizational skills

Job Description
		        The RoleDo you dream about being part of a team with the talent, passion, and financial backing to build top-notch, industry-changing cloud-based applications and platforms? At Veeva, we build enterprise cloud technology that powers the biggest names in pharmaceuticals, biotech, consumer goods, chemical & cosmetics industries. Our customers make vaccines, life-saving medicines, and life-enhancing products that make a difference in everyday lives. Our technology has transformed these industries, enabling them to get critical products and services to market faster. This emerging and growing branch of Veeva is looking for Software Engineer, Test Automation for multiple positions to expand global quality & release engineering efforts. Job Description
Civil Engineer Job Responsibilities:

Completes construction projects by preparing engineering design and documents and confirming specifications.
Designs construction projects by studying project concept, architectural drawings, and models.
Prepares engineering design by collecting and studying reports, maps, drawings, blueprints, aerial photographs, and tests on soil composition, terrain, hydrological characteristics, and related topographical and geologic data.
Determines project costs by calculating labor, material, and related costs.
Creates feasibility study by analyzing engineering design, conducting environmental impact studies, and assembling data.
Produces engineering documents by developing construction specifications, plans, and schedules.
Confirms adherence to construction specifications and safety standards by monitoring project progress, inspecting construction site, and verifying calculations and placements.
Fulfills project requirements by training and guiding operators.
Maintains operations by enforcing project and operational policies and procedures.
Provides engineering information by answering questions and requests.
Complies with federal, state, and local legal requirements by studying existing and new legislation; anticipating future legislation; enforcing adherence to requirements; and advising management on needed actions.
Maintains project database by writing computer programs, entering data, and completing backups.
Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

Civil Engineer Qualifications/Skills:

CAD and AutoCAD proficiency
Design skills
Site development
Database design
Planning
Conceptual skills
Legal compliance
Drafting, LISP
Problem solving
Role:: Draftsman/ Draughtsman - Civil/ Structural, Site/ Field Engineer - Civil/ Structural

Job Description

Civil engineers perform some or all of the following duties:
        Confer with clients and other members of the engineering team and conduct research to determine project requirements
        Plan and design major civil projects such as buildings, roads, bridges, dams, water and waste management systems and structural steel fabrications
        Develop construction specifications and procedures
        Evaluate and recommend appropriate building and construction materials
        Interpret, review and approve survey and civil design work
        Conduct field services for civil works
        Ensure construction plans meet guidelines and specifications of building codes and other regulations
        Establish and monitor construction work schedules
        Conduct feasibility studies, economic analyses, municipal and regional traffic studies, environmental impact studies or other investigations
        Monitor air, water and soil quality and develop procedures to clean up contaminated sites
        Conduct technical analyses of survey and field data for development of topographic, soil, hydrological or other information and prepare reports
        Act as project or site supervisor for land survey or construction work
        Prepare contract documents and review and evaluate tenders for construction projects
        Supervise technicians, technologists and other engineers and review and approve designs, calculations and cost estimates.

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Description:
Our people are at the heart of everything we do; they give our work purpose. If you want to be a part of our unwavering team and can bring your sense of imagination and determination to every challenge, then this is the right place for you.
 
Stantec is currently looking for a Civil Site Engineer to join our dynamic team and support on a design review and construction supervision project in Canada
 
Some of the key job responsibilities of this role entail this following:
 
•Responsible for reviewing the design proposals, work program, material submittals, method statements, shop drawings, payments, variation orders and claims etc.
 
•Effectively manage the site supervision staffs during construction & ensuring the works are being carried out according to the Contract specifications.
 
•Ensure monitoring on the quality of materials and workmanships installed, operated and maintained.
 
•Maintain the Resident Engineer’s daily diary and daily diaries and reports by his subordinates.
 
•Liaise with Client, Project Management and Contractor for resolution of project issues, in addition to concerned Authorities when required.
 
•Strong understanding of operation and control philosophies of surge protection devices, capable to review & approval of Contractor submittals for hydraulic studies & calculations, pumps, surge vessels, control valves.
 
•Supervise, review, monitor and report on progress.
 
•Ensure the site safety practices
 
•Prepare weekly and monthly progress reports
 
•Familiarity with conditions of contract, quality assurance.
 
•Liaise with client, co-ordination with Governmental Organization and other Consultants/Contractors
 
•Consistently adheres to and enforces internal Company processes and policies such as business and contracting rules.
 
•Demonstrates strong written and verbal communication and negotiating skills.
 
•Works in a manner to ensure personal safety and that of fellow employees by following company health and safety guidelines and policies.
*Graduate structural/civil engineer chartered or registered engineer from an internationally recognized institute.
 
 
To Apply:
 
Submit your required documents Updated CV / Qualification certificate scan copy. / Experience certificate scan copy (You don't have your current company experience letter then must be submitted appointment letter & last three months’ salary slip) / Passport front and back scan copy. / Candidate recent passport size photo. Job Description
		        Job Description Colruyt is looking for seasoned Business Analysts. Experienced Business Analysts collaborate with our business and IT organizations to deliver business-led, technology-enabled solutions that help enterprise adapt to their unique challenges and opportunities. He/she pursues the continuous improvement of business processes by analyzing processes and elaborating solutions that support process optimization. The Business Analyst functionally describe, test and implement the 'solutions' and support the business partner to secure this solution in his organization.Roles and Responsibilities of a Business Analyst: Analyze, model the to-be system, identify improvements to solve a problem or bring in efficiency for businessDescribe the functional & non-functional requirementsDetail out the business requirements to technology solutions & help the development teams realize the solutionPrepare test cases, test data and document the scenarios to evaluate the solutionFollow the communication plan to keep key stakeholders informed.Work with the business & project managers on the change management plan; prepare user manuals and instructions to take users alongExpected competencies from Business Analyst: 4-6 years of industry experience with at least 3 years in business analysisOpen to learn and adapt, embrace change as the only constantYou are social and you build easily professional relationships with people of all levels and departments in the organizationYou think analytically and have an eye for detailCustomer-oriented approachYou are assertive and can challenge othersYou must be fluent in English  both in verbal & written communicationNice to have competencies: Experience working with APIs and defining signaturesPropose logical data model for a systemDomain experience in retail, ecommerce, supply chain and warehouse management, finance or marketingExperience to work in onsite-offshore delivery approach for large and complex IT projectsWorking with European clients will be of added advantageProficiency in requirements elicitation practices including interviews, questionnaires, brainstorming, user stories, role-playing and prototypingIn collaboration with business teams, business architects and developers, you guide the discussions to define the IT solutions and processesYou analyze and describe the functional behavior of systems and their interactions in UML or other standard modeling techniques like Use case modelling or story boarding

Job Description
		        Job Description Rimini Street, Inc., the world's leading independent provider of support for enterprise application software, seeks a Business Analyst to work remote.Our company is currently privately held with plans to become a public company. Rimini Street views all of our employees as partners, and is committed to providing an exciting, participatory and team oriented work environment. In addition to our very competitive compensation packages, be prepared for challenging professional growth and fun along the way in our work hard, play hard corporate environment.We actively seek a Business Analyst. This is a remote role that can be based out of Hyderabad.Position SummaryReporting to the Director of Global Managed Services Operations, the Business Analyst will be responsible for bridging the gap between the business and IT using data analytics to assess processes, determine requirements, test solutions, and deliver data-driven enhancements and reports to executives, stakeholders and clients. A qualified candidate will have experience with ITIL-based service management programs and systems, managing multiple cross-functional initiatives and rollouts with a successful and proven delivery track record.In addition, this person will assist with improvements to current managed services methodologies, recommend new processes, procedures, and provide analytical support, training, and guidance to other teams as needed. They must prove to be trustworthy, decisive, loyal, and be able to handle stress. Working with various remote team members spread across multiple time zones is required in this role.Essential Duties & ResponsibilitiesWork with stakeholders to assess and organize requirements to improve the efficiency and effectiveness managed services processes.Partner with IT to communicate requirements, provide design assistance, and test developed solutions.Provide clear and consistent communication of enhancement initiatives to the team, business stakeholders and clients with detailed status.Establish and sustain strong on-going relationships with business and IT partners.Evaluate business requirements, new system specifications, vendor solutions, and provide recommendations.Provide leadership and motivation to project team members throughout the project life cycle.Manage a high degree of change in a fast paced, complex and demanding environmentProvide training in business analysis, service management, tools to other team members, stakeholders, and clients as needed.Additional Duties & ResponsibilitiesBe committed to excellence and high-quality standard.Promote trusted advisor relationship with business partners by modeling credibility, reliability, empathy, and lack of self-orientation.Other job-related duties and responsibilities may be assigned from time to time.Qualifications/Skills/Experience EducationBTech degree preferred or equivalent experience, preferably in the fields of computer science, engineering, or preferably computational and data scienceLocationHyderabad, IndiaExperience4 - 5 years as a business analyst in the service management or technology fieldsExperience managing several enhancement initiatives simultaneously and working with diverse remote teams across the world, with team sizes of 25 simultaneously and working with diverse remote teams across the world, with team sizes of 25 Experience in Agile/Scrum and Waterfall project management methodologiesExperience with analyzing complex requirements and delivering appropriate solutionsDemonstrate the ability to identify opportunities for change and the ability to convey the need for changeExperience to work on integration/migration projects in IT industrySkillsWorking knowledge of IT service management and managed services.Proficient with service management systems like ServiceNow, Salesforce Service Cloud, Cherwell, and Jira.Excellent communication (verbal and written) skills, including ability to tailor communication to audience to achieve desired results.Proficiency in Microsoft Project, SharePoint, Microsoft Office suite, including Outlook, Word, Excel, Visio, and PowerPointFamiliarity with collaboration tools like Microsoft TEAMS, OneDrive, and OneNoteLeadership qualities, including meeting facilitation, time management, organizational skills and ability to influence others

Location: location_on Bengaluru/ Bangalore (Karnataka), Delhi (Delhi), Hyderabad/ Secunderabad (Andhra Pradesh), Mumbai (Maharashtra), Pune (Maharashtra)
Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Business Analyst Job Responsibilities:

Elicits, analyzes, specifies, and validates the business needs of stakeholders, be they customers or end users.
Collaborates with project sponsors to determine project scope and vision.
Clearly identifies project stakeholders and establish customer classes, as well as their characteristics.
Conducts interviews to gather customer requirements via workshops, questionnaires, surveys, site visits, workflow storyboards, use cases, scenarios, and other methods.
Identifies and establishes scope and parameters of requirements analysis on a project-by-project basis to define project impact, outcome criteria, and metrics.
Works with stakeholders and project team to prioritize collected requirements.
Researches, reviews, and analyzes the effectiveness and efficiency of existing requirements-gathering processes and develop strategies for enhancing or further leveraging these processes.
Assists in conducting research on products to meet agreed upon requirements and to support purchasing efforts.
Participates in the QA of purchased solutions to ensure features and functions have been enabled and optimized.
Participates in the selection of any requirements documentation software solutions that the organization may opt to use.
Analyzes and verifies requirements for completeness, consistency, comprehensibility, feasibility, and conformity to standards.
Develops and utilizes standard templates to accurately and concisely write requirements specifications.
Translates conceptual customer requirements into functional requirements in a clear manner that is comprehensible to developers/project team.
Creates process models, specifications, diagrams, and charts to provide direction to developers and/or the project team.
Develops and conduct peer reviews of the business requirements to ensure that requirement specifications are correctly interpreted.
Assists with the interpretation of customer requirements into feasible options, and communicating these back to the business stakeholders.
Manages and tracks the status of requirements throughout the project lifecycle; enforce and redefine as necessary.
Communicates changes, enhancements, and modifications of business requirements verbally or through written documentation to project managers, sponsors, and other stakeholders so that issues and solutions are understood.
Provides guidance and/or instruction to junior staff members.

Business Analyst Qualifications / Skills:

Able to exercise independent judgment and take action on it
Excellent analytical, mathematical, and creative problem-solving skills
Excellent listening, interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills
Logical and efficient, with keen attention to detail
Highly self-motivated and directed
Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks while under pressure
Strong customer service orientation
Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment
Specialization:: Business Alliances,Business Analyst,Channel & Segment Management,Market Research
Role:: Business Analyst, Product/ Brand Manager, Product Head, Marketing Executive

Job Description
Business Partners provide guidance in a given field and help line management make informed decisions. 
Key responsibilities seen on a Business Partner example resume are analyzing trends and metrics, implementing relevant policies and regulations, developing strategies, executing training programs, and reporting to top management. Most resumes for Business Partner focus on skills like business acumen, problem solving, strategic planning, networking, innovation, and computer competences. Successful Business Partner usually hold a degree in business administration or a relevant field.
Role:: Sales Executive/ Officer, Regional Sales Manager, Regional Sales Manager, Sales Support Executive/ Manager

		        Job Description Position Description: Business Analyst, EBSRimini Street provides support and software updates for regulatory compliance, taxation updates, payroll updates, as well as application fixes and much more.This position is responsible for marrying in-depth product (EBS Financials) expertise with the latest tax and regulatory changes to produce system impact specifications and test strategies for Development & QA. The position will follow each tax and regulatory change from discovery through successful translation into an application update. This role is vital in providing high quality deliverables to our clients and keeping their mission-critical enterpriseApplications compliant.The focus of this role will be to provide functional support on all EBS Finance changes in the EMEA region.ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESExperience and in-depth functional knowledge in EBS Financial modules (10 years) - General Ledger (GL), Accounts Payable (AP), Accounts Receivable (AR), E-Business tax (ZX), Fixed Assets (FA).Configuration of EBS Financial modules according to business requirementsAbility to look for improvement opportunities in the systemAbility to articulate business requirements clearly and concisely and translating them into user storiesAbility to work within the Agile framework acting as Product Owner on all key EBS Financial legislative changesEnsure total product compliance with all applicable legislation and regulations through the analysis of each tax and legislative changeOrganization and communication of such information, clearly disclosing the details needed for product specialists and subscribing clients to make necessary system changes when necessaryWork collaboratively with the QA and development teams to ensure user stories and tasks are clearly understood and requirements are being satisfiedAssist with the formulation of test strategies, review test plans, and perform system tests, working with the QA team to ensure high quality deliverablesQualifications/Skills/Experience SKILLS/EXPERIENCEMinimum 10 years on EBS Financials (Functional)(Desirable) Basic technical skills in Oracle EBSExperience on EBS Financials EMEA country versions(Desirable) Experienced in Agile (2   years)(Desirable) Experience working in Jira for Agile (preferred not mandatory)Ability to communicate effectively across various teams based in the EMEA region and globally as requiredHave a client focussed or consultative approachBe committed to excellence and high-quality standardsBe able to work to tight deadlines, remaining calm under pressureAbility to work remotely/virtually with other team membersEDUCATIONDegree in Business or Information Systems or related field(Desirable) Masters level qualification(Desirable) Chartered Accountant

Job_title: Business Analyst I, Buyer Abuse Prevention - Analytics
Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
		        DESCRIPTION Amazon.coms Buyer Risk Prevention (BRP) mission is to make Amazon the safest and most trusted place worldwide to transact online. Amazon runs one of the most dynamic e-commerce marketplaces in the world, with nearly 2 million sellers worldwide selling hundreds of millions of items in ten countries. BRP safeguards every financial transaction across all Amazon sites. As such, BRP designs and builds the software systems, risk models and operational processes that minimize risk and maximize trust in Amazon.com. BRP organization is looking for a Business Analyst for its In Region support team. The team is being grown to provide insights and support for BRP in our emerging marketplaces and provide analytical solutions to help drive operational efficiencies, uncover the hidden risks and trends, reduce investigation errors and bad debt, improve customer experience and predict & recommend the optimizations for future state of BRP buyer abuse in each country.As a Business Analyst, you will be responsible for modeling complex problems, discovering insights and identifying opportunities through the use of business intelligence, data mining and visualization techniques. You will need to collaborate effectively with internal stakeholders and cross-functional teams to solve problems, create operational efficiencies, and deliver successfully against high organizational standards. The candidate should be able to apply a breadth of tools, data sources and analytical techniques to answer a wide range of high-impact business questions and present the insights in concise and effective manner. Additionally, the candidate should be an effective communicator capable of independently driving issues to resolution and communicating insights to non-technical audiences. This is a high impact role with goals that directly impacts the bottom line of the business.Responsibilities:Use analytics and data mining techniques to solve complex problems and drive business decisions.Employ the appropriate tools, methodologies to discover patterns of risks, abuse and help reduce bad debtDesign experiments, test hypotheses, and build actionable models to optimize BRP in a specific countrySolve analytical problems, and effectively communicate methodologies and resultsBuild analyses for product launchesDraw inferences and conclusions, and create dashboards and visualizations of processed data, identify trends, anomaliesWork closely with internal stakeholders such as business teams, engineering teams, and partner teams and align them with respect to your focus areaBASIC QUALIFICATIONS2  years of tax, finance or a related analytical field experienceExperience defining requirements and using data and metrics to draw business insightsExperience with SQL or ETLPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS3  Years of Experience in SQL and BA Visualization tools

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
		        DESCRIPTION Our mission at Finance Analytics is to provide complete and accurate data for financial and business reporting and analytics. As such, Finance Analytics designs, builds, maintains and enhances scalable systems that provide accurate data as well as actionable insights to the business.As a Business Analyst in Finance Analytics, you will be responsible for working with terabytes of data to develop automated and self service scalable solutions for Finance and Business Partners. You will be responsible for building a robust set of operational, financial and business metrics,requirements documentation and will utilize metrics to determine improvement opportunities.From Day 1, you will be challenged with a variety of tasks, ranging from creating datasets, reports, dashboards to metadata modeling, pipeline monitoring. You will interact with internal program, finance, Operation and Capacity planning team, and technical teams to gather requirements, structure scalable and perform data solutions, and gain a deep understanding of key datasets. You will design, implement and drive adoption of new analytic technologies and solutions and promote industry standard best practices. You will be responsible to tune query performance against large and complex data sets. You will help translate analytic insights into concrete, actionable recommendations for business or product improvement.Key job responsibilitiesGather business requirements, document specifications, identify appropriate resources needed, assemble the right project team, assign individual responsibilities, and develop the milestones and launch schedule to ensure timely and successful delivery of the project.Design and develop highly available dashboards and metrics in QuicksightExperience defining program requirements and using data and metrics to determine improvementsExecute cross functional, high impact projects to improve operations performancePerform business analysis and data queries using SQL, R etcBASIC QUALIFICATIONS1  years of tax, finance or a related analytical field experienceExperience defining requirements and using data and metrics to draw business insightsExperience with SQL or ETL1  year experience in visualization tools.1  year experience in gathering and documenting requirement.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSExperience with reporting and Data Visualization tools such as Quick Sight / Tableau / Power BI or other BI packagesExperience writing business requirements documents, functional specifications, and use cases

Job_title: ESDD Business Analyst and Tester Support,Assistant Manager
Location: location_on Bengaluru/ Bangalore (Karnataka), Hyderabad/ Secunderabad (Andhra Pradesh), Mumbai (Maharashtra), Pune (Maharashtra), Bhutan (Bhutan)
Job_desc_raw:
Job Description

1. Five (5) years’ in project work and technical writing to include: detailed analysis, development and maintenance of business requirements, technical requirements, use cases and design documents
	2. Five (5) years’ experience in project work in the Business Progress Reengineering (BPR) arena; at least three (3) years of said experience must have been mapping the current state of a business process and analyzing the business process to find gaps.
	3. Five (5) years’ (within the last 10 years) experience in project work in facilitating Joint Application Requirements (JAR) and Joint Application Design (JAD) sessions with project Subject Matter Experts and other technical staff.
	4. Must have a minimum of three (3) years (within the last 5 years) of experience in Oracle 11g writing and troubleshooting SQL code to design back-end queries for data set-up and verification.
	5. Five (5) years’ (within the last 10 years) experience performing system test duties; writing scripts, executing scripts, creating test cases and test data, reviewing test results; also assisting with User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
	6. Experience with Business Intelligence (BI) dashboards and BI reports in Power BI Platform.

This will require mathematical analysis and writing production level software with standard language preferably S/ R languages , or C/C   for demonstration, simulation, back testing and end-point implementation.2.Develop instrument pricing mechanism in line with business objective, for different financial contracts for both standard, traded in financial and commodity exchanges, as well as exotic in nature.3.Build Statistical models for predictive analytic and sensitivity understanding, typically using advanced univariate as well as multivariate Time series econometric techniques.4.Develop Quantitative Risk control and Hedge framework for on-going Risk & control policy implementation for hedging operations and trading support functions as part of the Risk management consulting group.5.Provide analysis, recommendations, consultation, and expert advice on prototyping as well as system/process planning.6.Develop high level of product and business knowledge for the financial services and product industry.Desired Profile :1.We are looking for the candidate who possesses robust understanding of Statistical philosophy and having prior hands-on experience in applying Statistical tools and techniques to address different Business issues typically in Finance domain.2.The suitable candidate must be well versed in handling and applying tools like Regression analytics under Time series environment, ARIMA, VAR class of models, ARCH/GARCH modeling philosophy and should be correct and confident enough to interpret the results in layman language. Having advanced Mathematics background especially in stochastic calculus, Simulation techniques will be an added advantage.3.We put particular emphasis on candidate who possesses advanced computer programming skill with C/C  /Fortran/Python and S /R (must) languages.4.Understanding of financial derivatives & risk measurement methodology5.Strong in basic understanding of risk concepts, functioning of various markets/instruments (futures, forwards, options etc.).6.Identifying and analyze various risk scenarios and developing risk management controls for different businesses.7.Interpret and develop various MIS systems of client portfolios, conduct risk assessment, identifying and estimating the potential losses/risks affecting the business.8.Prepare risk reports, generate risk alerts on associated decisions and recommend to higher authorities.

We are  looking for a Sr. Accountant to be an integral part of the financial wizards. Summarize current financial status by collecting information, preparing balance sheet, profit and loss statement, and other reports;

Job Description
Full Job Description

Work with one of the leading global private equity funds
Oversee complete office administration for the Nariman Point office

About Our Client
Client is one of the world's leading private investment firms with over US$140 billion in assets under management. It manages a range of funds including private equity, public equity, leveraged debt assets, venture capital, and absolute return capital. Our competitive advantage is grounded in a diligence-intensive, value-added investment approach that enables the firm to deliver industry-leading returns for its investors. Headquartered in Boston, client offices are in Chicago, Dublin, Guangzhou, Hong Kong, London, Luxembourg, Madrid, Melbourne, Mumbai, Munich, New York, Palo Alto, San Francisco, Seoul, Shanghai, Singapore, Sydney and Tokyo
Job Description
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

General office administration (Stationery, supplies, cleaning, space planning, seat allocations for new employees and visitors, incoming/outgoing courier management, maintenance & repairs, access cards etc.)
Establish and maintain relationships with internal team (HR, Finance, IT and Facilities team, etc.) and vendor management (e.g. landlord, suppliers, renovation company, property management company, banks, auditors, IT vendors, travel agents and hotel representatives, etc.)
Ensure that the office complies with local regulatory requirements (include building code, fire safety code etc.) and maintain the office in clean, hygiene and safe condition
Drive discussions around local benefits (e.g. renewal of medical plan, etc.)
Support HR activities such as onboarding and offboarding arrangements, recruiting efforts (e.g. Associate and Admin recruiting), local training, statutory filings (e.g. POSH, etc.)
Oversee and manage EA allocation
Main point of contact for HR projects and initiatives (e.g. leave tracking, DEI activities and events, etc.)
Coordinate:

1. internal and external meetings
2. registration for all conferences, field trips and group meetings
3. payroll process and stamping for employer tax reporting
4. local contract negotiation, signing and renewals
5. petty cash and corporate credit card operations in accordance with the policy
6. with EA on finance related matters (e.g. airfare refunds, quarterly finance townhall & storage of T&E physical receipts)

First reviewer of Mumbai office T&Es in accordance with global corporate policy and regional finance guidance
Collate day-to-day corporate invoices for Finance
Collate deal costs invoices from and provide payment status to private equity deal team
Support some business activities (e.g. deal pipeline management, standing meetings with key advisory firms etc.)
Other ad-hoc tasks (e.g. CSR coordination, board sitting fees collation and Diwali bonus, etc.)
Participate in IT vendor reviews/selection to help us drive performance and ensure fit for purpose services
Coordinate with IT on upcoming onboardings and equipment needs
Coordinate courier services together with IT

The Successful Applicant
GENERAL QUALIFICATIONS

Minimum 8 years of relevant experience
Proficient in all aspects of Microsoft Office (especially Excel and PowerPoint and Outlook)
Extremely organized and detail orientated
Dedicated and loyal
Willing to go the extra mile
Cooperative team spirit
Proactive, ability to take initiative
Effective communication skills

What's on Offer

Global exposure
