Job_title: Staff / Senior Software Automation Engineer -SDET (Java, Selenium,API)
Location: location_on Hyderabad/ Secunderabad (Andhra Pradesh), Bengaluru/ Bangalore (Karnataka)
Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
		        Job DescriptionLocation :Bangalore, Hyderabad, RemoteZscaler seeks an experienced and agile Staff QA Automation Engineer with unique skills. The ideal candidate will play a vital role in the software development lifecycle and will be responsible for improving overall quality assurance outcomes by applying problem-solving skills, QA best practices, and various tools. The fast-paced environment requires taking the initiative and managing ambiguity to drive effective results. This role may interface with customers, subject matter experts, technical experts, developers, and other QC engineers globally and in different time zones.The Staff QC Automation Engineer will report to the Senior QC Manager of Software Engineering. The Software Engineer will have end-to-end ownership of features starting from testing, automation (if applicable), deployment, and helping with monitoring of the feature(s).Like any technology company, we rely on QC to ensure our products perform as promised. But as a company that provides technology services based on our purpose-built global cloud platform, QC has a singularly important role at Zscaler in identifying potential customer pain points ahead of time. Our customers  including some of the largest global organizations  send all their traffic across our platform, and thats why QA is out in front at Zscaler, helping to ensure that our services work correctly in the cloud and that our cloud, itself, is delivering on SLAs and providing the performance and reliability on which our customers depend.About the TeamThe Isolation Platform is a small distributed team that works fast and lives on the cutting edge of software engineering in the backend, front, and infrastructure. We like open-source, but we are fearless in building stuff ourselves where it makes sense, and we can optimize something. Our philosophy is: that done is better than perfect, and we strive to work iteratively and optimize our processes to achieve reliable and fast product deliverables that delight our customers.The fast-paced environment requires taking the initiative and managing ambiguity to drive effective results. This role may interface with customers, subject matter experts, technical experts, developers, and other QC engineers globally and in different time zones.Responsibilities:- Review product specifications and write the test case, develop test plans for assigned areas in the Engineering team for Cloud Browser Isolation- Ability to design test plans with clear separation of functional, integration, regression, and exploratory tests to ensure application quality.- Build and Automate test cases - Collaborate on the design and architecture of the automation framework.- Engage in test case execution, including defect documentation and tracking, resolution support, and fix verification.- Assist in the development and delivery of training to cross-functional teams- Follow an iterative software development methodology and contribute to all software development lifecycle and support phases.- Recreate complex customer and production-reported issues to determine root causes and verify the fixes.- Work closely with the Engineering team to design a test strategy for their tools and components- Lead Technically the team, from the functional testing point of view and the automation testing point of view, with the support of the Senior Quality ManagerQualifications7  years of experience testing software for cloud-based products- Have a strong understanding of cloud infrastructure and solutions.- Hands-on experience programming in Java with Selenium- Hands-on experience doing automation tests for APIs- Experienced building and contributing to an automation framework development & test automation.- Working knowledge of Unix/Linux environments.- Must be very hands-on, passionate about quality, and willing to collaborate with multiple teams for system testing- Excellent debugging and troubleshooting skills.- Have a strong understanding of cloud infrastructure and solutions.- Hands-on experience with Image recognition test tools is pleasant to have plus- Experience with AWS is a plus- Experience with Python, Go, or any programming language is a plus- Hands-on experience in mobile automation is a big plus- Hands-on experience in building a framework for mobile automation behind proxies is a big plus- Docker and Kubernetes are a big plus

Job Description
		        Is quality your passion? Do you spot every bug there is in the software? Do you like to multitask and are you ready for a challenge? Are you a flexible team player who can bounce back quickly from setbacks? Then you are the Agile Tester we are looking for.You will keep up with the latest developments and you are always looking for opportunities to improve yourself, your team, and our product.Responsibilities:Interact with development teams to develop a strong understanding of the product and testing objectivesDesign and develop test scripts/ suites to address business and technical use casesExecute test scripts, report the issues, and prepare reports and help improving the quality as per the guidelinesUse existing tools and techniques to execute test cases and build/script new tools for performing testing/validation functionParticipate in troubleshooting and triaging of issues with different teams to drive towards root cause identification and resolutionDocument, track and escalate issues as appropriate, using defect tracking tools or similar tools/meansPerform Sanity, Regression, technical and functional tests as per the pre / post deployment plan during the off-hours maintenance windowsDevelop and execute performance, Security, and penetration testsRaise an alert when an important issue is likely to put in jeopardy the whole project.Minimum Requirements:3-5 years of hands-on expertise in Selenium with C# or Java.Experience in developing Selenium automation frameworkHands on experience with MySQL, Jenkins, Maven, Bitbucket.Experience in test automation for Agile Continuous Integration/Development.Experience with API testing with Soap UIEducation: BE / BTech/ ME/ MTech/ MCAExperience: 3-5 yearsAdditional Qualifications:Must be flexible, independent, and self-motivated.Punctual, Regular, and consistent attendance.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Electrical Engineering Technician Duties and Responsibilities
The true scope of an Electrical Engineering Technician’s job will depend upon the job they are hired for, but there are several primary responsibilities that can be applied to nearly all Electrical Engineering Technician positions. A review of current job listings identified the following core responsibilities.

1. Install Systems
When an Electrical Engineering Technician is called upon to install electrical systems to a new or existing building or to assist with creating communications or navigational equipment there is much work to be done. Electrical Engineering Technicians will need to be able to design or assist in the layout design process, order the necessary parts and equipment for the project and then either perform the installation themselves or assist in the installation process. They must ensure all circuits and parts are correctly installed and function as intended.

2. Evaluate Systems
Electrical Engineering Technicians are also hired to perform product control and system evaluations. This may require them to inspect a design plan, evaluate an electrical system and its components or actively test electronic equipment and provide recommendations or repairs. Electrical Engineering Technicians must know how to test circuits using diagnostic tools, create solutions and have the ability to complete basic repair work. Some Electrical Engineering Technicians are also hired to perform preventative maintenance to ensure the electrical systems are always up-to-date and safe.
3.Create Documentation
Electrical Engineering Technicians are expected to keep detailed documentation on all the systems and equipment they work on. They may be tasked with creating a user's manual, updating a maintenance log or providing regular reports on the tasks they have completed. The ability to create visual aids is often important for Electrical Engineering Technicians.

Job Description
		        DESCRIPTION As an Amazon Fleet Remediation Project Design Engineer in Amazon Data Services India Private Limited (ADSIPL), you will lead design projects in operational data centers in India, that remediate issues, upgrade our existing infrastructure or add new services. You will be the 'go to' engineering resource for these projects in India and will provide lifecycle support from design through implementation. You will use your electrical expertise to: Own the design for existing India data center upgrades and design-solutions which add data center infrastructure, capacity, improve availability, and/or increase sustainability. Prepare/review short circuit coordination studies and maintain the software models to match as-built site conditions. Perform design and equipment submittal review for Data Centers in India. Interface with internal and external data center design engineering team, server hardware team, environmental health and safety team, field engineering, and controls engineering to promote standards that maintain consistency and reliability in services delivered. Work on concurrent projects in India Act as a technical subject matter expert across critical infrastructure remediation projects in Amazon owned/leased/Colo Data Centers across India. Support construction, commissioning, operations, and turnover.Amazon's vision is to be the world's most customer-centric company, and this role is key to that vision. As a Fleet Remediation Project Design Electrical Engineer, you will be leading projects in our data centers to meet ever-evolving customer needs as we continue expanding our fleet to hyper-scale. As an ideal candidate you: Possess Strong Engineering Judgement and are able to provide design and recommendations despite uncertainty. Are detail and data oriented with familiarity in design process and implementation of your design in compliance with local/international codes. Have experience managing engineering projects and engineering consultants. Build trust and relationships with different stakeholders (e.g., Operations, Commissioning, Construction and Design) Manage design and as built drawings and documents Prepare and present progress reports to all relevant stakeholders Be inclined to get into the field to see things up close and travel 25 PERCENT Each day you will interact with different teams responsible for all aspects of the data centers in India. You will prioritize your activities to support data center safety, remediation projects, capacity, and availability, focusing on the actions that are most impactful. You will have the opportunity to work on projects locally in India.We have an immediate opening for a Fleet Remediation Project Design Electrical Engineer in India. If you meet these qualifications, exude passion, and enjoy the challenge of innovative projects at hyper-scale, this job is for you!Our team is dedicated to supporting new team members. Our team has a broad mix of experience levels and Amazon tenures, and were building an environment that celebrates knowledge sharing and mentorship.Here at AWS, we embrace our differences. We are committed to furthering our culture of inclusion. We have ten employee-led affinity groups, reaching 40,000 employees in over 190 chapters globally. We have innovative benefit offerings, and we host annual and ongoing learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences. Amazons culture of inclusion is reinforced within our 16 Leadership Principles, which remind team members to seek diverse perspectives, learn and be curious, and earn trust.Our team also puts a high value on work-life balance. Striking a healthy balance between your personal and professional life is crucial to your happiness and success here, which is why we arent focused on how many hours you spend at work or online. Instead, were happy to offer a flexible schedule so you can have a more productive and well-balanced lifeboth in and outside of work.BASIC QUALIFICATIONS  Bachelors Degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent experience. 6  cumulative years of design experience with industrial or commercial engineering in Mission Critical facilities including but not limited to: data centers, power generation, oil / gas facilities. (Experienced Engineer)Knowledge of building codes and regulations for your region. Experience reading, interpreting, and creating construction drawings, specifications, and submittal documents. Ability to carry design concepts through exploration, development, and into deployment/mass productionPossess excellent communication and writing skills, attention to detail, maintain high quality standards Basic understanding of both mechanical and electrical equipment/design related to data center electrical and mechanical topologyPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS  Ability to work cross-functionally to solve problems. Organized and have the ability to set priorities and meet deadlines and budget Possess leadership and problem-solving skills Experience using a variety of web based and other software tools for calculation and data processing. Direct experience with the design, construction, operation, or maintenance of mission critical facilities, especially data centers. Experience as resident design engineer or hands-on (in the field) design consultant. EPMS/SCADA/BMS Controls system experience (software and/or hardware) Advanced degree in engineering, business, or related field. Have fluent knowledge of continuous operating redundant electrical systems, cooling systems, air flow containment and building management systems Meets/exceeds Amazons leadership principles requirements for this role Meets/exceeds Amazons functional/technical depth and complexity for this role

Job Description
		        Data Center Construction ManagerThe Data Center Construction Manager (CM) of Amazon Data Services India Private Limited (ADSIPL), the local data center entity in India, is responsible for managing some of the most technical, cost efficient, and fast paced construction project schedules achievable. Amazon Construction Managers are constantly challenged to drive continuous improvement and deliver the highest quality, most technically efficient data centers in the world.As a Data Center CM of ADSIPL you will be a part of highly creative, efficient team tasked with tackling the most fascinating and challenging problems in building Amazon data facilities in India. Amazon CM's are always at the forefront of the construction industry in terms of innovation, and maintain a focus to deliver the most innovative products to our customers.Our data centers are industry leading facilities in terms of energy efficiency and cost effectiveness. The Data Center CM of ADSIPL is ultimately responsible for the day to day construction oversight and management of the contractors in India. The CM will also be utilized as a leader in their specific discipline (construction management, building services, architectural, electrical or mechanical engineering) and be responsible as a team member of ADSIPL for delivering construction of some of the most sophisticated electrical and mechanical systems in the world.At Amazon we leverage unique opportunities presented to us by owning everything from the substation, to the server, and back to the cooling towers. We are diverse, upbeat, creative, team-oriented construction professionals working on a daily basis to develop data centers that are changing the face of data facilities.BASIC QUALIFICATIONSBachelors degree or relevant work experience in Construction Management, Architecture, Structural, Civil, Mechanical or Electrical Engineering10-12 years of work experience in design, construction or program management in mission critical facilities.Be able to read and interpret construction related drawings for all disciplines.Possess demonstrable leadership and problem solving skills.Be a motivated, highly dependable individual with limited oversight.Ability to evaluate the constructability of new technologies, and determine construction methods of data center equipment and facilities.Ability to carry new design concepts through exploration, development, and into deployment/mass production.Ability to define data center system-level architecture, specify/document performance and equipment requirements to vendors and contractors, communicate conceptual designs, and create/maintain project documentation before, during and after constructionAbility and willingness to think outside of the box to find creative and innovative solutions prior to and during the construction process to reduce costs and schedules with no impact on quality and reliability.Possess excellent communication skills in English and have an attention to detail, and be able to maintain high quality standardsPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS Preferred QualificationsExperience directly related to the design or construction of large data center facilities, either colocation or client owned/operated.Previous vendor and contractor/subcontractor negotiation and management skills associated with construction and project execution.Experience with fast track design/build projects and or multiple significant upgrade projects.Experience with large scale technical operations or compute farms.Knowledge of Indian and local building codes and regulations including Fire Codes, Building Codes, Energy Efficiency Codes, Sanitary Codes and Safety Codes.Knowledge and experience with large scale mechanical and power systems.Experience in power and mechanical system reliability and risk assessment studies (SPOF)Experience with mechanical air handling units, power management and power monitoring systemsWork experience with global international companies, both in larger APAC region and within US based organizations.Ability to speak HindiAmazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

Circuit Design Engineers create circuit boards used in a variety of electronics. 
Typical duties completed by a Circuit Design Engineer are reading specifications, designing circuits and circuit boards, conducting lab tests, and completing cost and safety assessments. 
Based on our collection of resumes in the field, main job requirements are knowledge of electronic circuits, proficiency with relevant software, teamwork, good communication skills, and design review presentation abilities. A well-written example resume for Circuit Design Engineer should make display of a Bachelor’s Degree in electrical engineering.

Job Description
Job Description
Responsibilities:

Review Project Quality Requirement of Company / Client and transfer all the requirements to related Quality and Certification Requirement and impose it to Supplier and Subcontractor to follow
Review and approve Sub-contractor and Supplier Quality Plan, ITP, specific Inspection procedures (mock-up, NCR, repairing work etc.)
Organize and attend regular supplier / project quality meetings as required
Performs scheduled supplier / subcontractor quality audits to ensure compliance with project quality requirements and continuous improvement. Provide feedback to Quality Manager and Project Manager on the results of inspections/audits recommendations
Ensure QC requirements attained and QA tasks are completed before equipment or product is shipped
Regularly monitor all required quality records and documentation of subcontractors / suppliers. Assure and assist QA/QC Admin to maintain accurate quality records, certifications and database records
Consult / advise with supplier and subcontractor for immediate containment when non-conformance has been confirmed on purchased / installed product.
Conduct specific Site Quality trainings as required (mock-up, ITP etc.) as and when necessary
Implement internal Quality Management Plan / Project Quality Plans including customer and project specific Plans / Inspection Procedure
Monitors supplier quality performance by tracking product defects, delivery failures and other recorded quality incidents involving he supplier’s failure to meet requirements

Requirements:

Diploma/Degree in Electrical Engineering or Mechanical / Metallurgical / Welding Engineering or related discipline
Possess at least 5 years QAQC hands-on experience performing QA and QC job functions in all levels of organization during Engineering, Procurement, Construction and Commissioning phases of the EPC projects (Petrochemical / Power / Waste / Oil & Gas plant) in multicultural environment
Highly motivated individuals with the ability to work under minimal supervision.

Mechanical:

Possess overall experience and knowledge in all disciplines required to execute the overall EPC project related QA/QC activities, apart from the core Mechanical, Welding, Piping and Structural discipline

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Main Role and Responsibilities
Planning and Design of Electrical engineering works for building services projects to deliver buildable design within a timely manner, and economical service to meet client’s requirement. Incumbent must influence across services without formal authority and manage the success of projects.
Key Responsibilities

Design of electrical services such as sub-station, small power, lighting, security system, data cabling, public address system etc.
Presentation of design concept report to client.
Preparation of M&E cost estimate base on approved design scheme.
Preparation of technical specifications and tender documentation.
Co-ordination of M&E services within the office.
Reviewing of shop drawings, material submissions and handle RFIs.
Verification of Work Progress and Variation Order for progress claim.
Liaise with main contractor, architect, authorities to ensure technical compliance and timely completion of project.
Carry out site investigation survey and submitting of technical reports.
Project Management from pre-development through to completion, including the following
Site Assessment and Inspection
Design development and co-ordination
Attend site meetings, technical meetings etc to resolve technical issues.
Following up with authorities on submissions, inspection and issuance of certification.

Prerequisites

Degree in Electrical Engineering
At least 3 years’ hands-on experience in design in an engineering consultancy firm for degree holder. Candidates with professional engineer registration would be considered for senior position.
Experience in handling full cycle of building service projects and proven track record with strong background in Air-Conditioning and Mechanical Ventilation Design.
Good understanding of Singapore Code of Practice and authority submission process.
Confident and have strong presentation & communication skills
Able to work independently as well as in a team setting

Job Description
		        OverviewOur hubs, satellite routers and network management software address the growing complexity of deploying and managing global IP networks. Our specialized technology includes transmission security (TRANSEC), Communication Signal Interference Removal (CSIR?) anti-jam technology and Open Antenna Modem Interface Protocol (OpenAMIP). We bring innovation, integration and intelligence to satellite-based IP communications that government and military organizations trust. By providing quality certifications with the most bandwidth-efficient, scalable and highly secure platform, we have rapidly become the technology provider of choice for military and government-driven mission-critical applications.We are seeking for a team player with solid technical skills to work with our team of smart, creative, and dedicated engineering team-members.This position is based out of our Herndon, VA location with the option of a remote work schedule.This is a senior level cross-functional engineering position, supporting the development of our satellite communications equipment. Our products incorporate FPGAs and CPLDs from a variety of vendors including Xilinx and Altera/Intel. In this role, the engineer will be responsible for the creation, simulation, and validation of RTL based designs, including digital communications capabilities. In addition, the engineer will be expected to provide architectural insight to both hardware and software engineers and ensure designs can be successfully integrated into the larger system.Responsibilities Designing and testing DSP-based, high speed FPGA designs Designing and supporting top-level digital communication design and system simulations Translating requirements into FPGA/waveform architectures Implementing and documenting FPGA designs using HDL (System Verilog, VHDL, etc.) Supporting systems integration and Test Engineering to produce functional design Producing simulations of and designs for both channel improvement measures, such as spectral bandwidth efficiency, and user density improvement measures, such as interference mitigation/cancellation, multiuser detection, and phased array antenna techniques Designing the implementations for further advances in adaptive TDMA, SCPC return channels Designing and the implementation of anti-jam DSP techniques implemented in FPGA logic Writing internal and external facing documents about our physical layer FPGA technologyRequired Qualifications QualificationsSkill-set for DSP:1. FPGA design2. Verilog/VHDL OR Xilinx/Altera3. Matlab/Sinulink4. RF 8  years of related experience FPGA design experience using Verilog, VHDL or System Verilog language targeting Xilinx/Altera FPGA?s Knowledge of DSP and digital communications . Understanding of time domain versus frequency domain analysis, filter structures, and modulation/coding algorithms. Ability to describe and architect trade-offs for resource-limited systems. Experience Matlab/Simulink or equivalent for development of DSP algorithms implemented in FPGA?s Ability to plan/perform analysis, studies/trade-offs in support of subsystem specification and hardware, FPGA and software design recommendations Experience in RF lab, including network setups (switches, cables, amplifiers and filters) and signal analysis (Spectrum Analyzers, Network Analyzers, signal generators, etc.)Education: Bachelor's degree (BA/BS) in electrical engineering, computer engineering, or closely related field (must be from accredited college or university); MSCS/MSEE would be a plusTravel: 0-10 PERCENT Desired Qualifications Additional experience in the following areas is a plus: Experience with digital communications and control theory ? stability and feedback control Extensive experience with both Altera and Xilinx design and verification tools Experience with Xilinx and Altera System-on-Chip devices: Xilinx Zynq-7000, Xilinx Zynq MPSoC, Altera SoC FPGA Background in RF chain design and considerations Background in anti-jam methodologies and design considerations Experience with C/C  , bash, Python programming, etc. Experience with Xilinx and/or Altera high level synthesis tools Experience in an Agile/Scrum environment Satellite Communication experience

Job Description
		        Pursue novel motor and servo-drive designs for new automotive products and technologies, such as electric steering, braking, chassis and transmission systems.Use finite element modelling and analytical calculations to analyze and optimize motors, actuators and sensors; and their electric drive systems.Customize and automate simulations using a variety of design and analysis tools such as Ansys, Motor-CAD and MATLAB.Incorporate technology developments into new designs to improve performance, fault tolerance, controllability and cost.Develop Digital Twin models for virtual prototyping, embracing multi-physics simulation and cloud computing and participate in investigation and solution of production challenges.Your profile :Degree in Electrical Engineering or related discipline. Ideally post graduate qualifications in motor design.A sound knowledge of motor operating and control principles.Fluent English language (and willingness for occasional travel to Europe if required).Useful experience would include: motor electromagnetic design and optimization; motor drive/control for permanent magnet AC machines; FE simulation (e.g. Ansys Maxwell, Motor-CAD); optimization methods; programming/scripting (e.g. MATLAB); thermal or structural modelling, and automation of these simulation and model generation activities.

Job_title: Sr. Software Engineer /Staff /Senior Staff/ Principal Engineer (C |Networking Protocols |TCP/IP| HTTPS )
Location: location_on Hyderabad/ Secunderabad (Andhra Pradesh), Bengaluru/ Bangalore (Karnataka)
Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
		        Job DescriptionLocation- Hyderabad, BangaloreRole- Senior/ SE/Staff Engineer (C & Networking -TCP/IP /HTTPS)Exp- Min 3 years of relevant experienceAs a Software Engineer(multiple levels), you will work on building the next generation Zscaler Private Access (ZPA) product and Shift product in the Emerging Technology group. You will play a crucial role in designing, building, and enhancing distributed systems components, write high-performance code using very efficient algorithms, and ensure that memory is used efficiently so that system responsiveness is maintained during high load times. You must also be able to process packets at both ingress and egress points at very high speed so that the client using the system does not perceive any increased latencies. Additionally, you will collaborate with the operations team (OPS) to deploy, monitor and if required patch the changes with fixes and enhancements as well as continuously scale the systems as more customers/users get added, the engineer should be able to identify hotspots, and timely alleviate/remediate the situation.Come and join our team and be part of this exciting transformation to cloud-based security.Responsibilities / Requirements:5  years of experience in C programming in a highly distributed and enterprise-scale environmentVery strong design and development skills for high-volume production applicationsTCP/IP protocol stack, HTTP, DNS, and other related protocolsExperience developing distributed software product architecturesUnix/Linux Kernel & file systemExperience coding in C/C   and other technologiesExperience working with large data setsStrong software design, profiling, and verification skillsDeep understanding of the concepts behind solid software design: Abstraction, Modularity, Design Patterns, Representation Invariants, etc.Networking, wireless, and/or security experience or knowledge preferredWork experience through complete software project delivery cyclesBig Plus:Experience working with Identity stores such as AD/ADFS, authentication and authorization protocols & standards such as SAML, OAuth, MFA and KerberosKnowledge of Identity Management solution such as Okta, Sailpoint, CyberarkExperience working in Security, Encryption, TLS, SSHKnowledge of OT/IoT, Industrial Control System security will be an advantageQualificationsEducation Required:Master's or Bachelors degree in either Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or Software Engineering

Job Description
		        Overview DescriptionSoftware development for embedded (system) software products. Individual must have the ability to read and understand system requirements, system test requirements and establish a system design approach based on those requirements aligned with the defined coding standards. The selected candidate must have a background in embedded (system) software development, devices/system interaction and troubleshooting, and will be involved in all aspects of the system software development process (concept, design, validation and production). The selected candidate will interact frequently with project management both locally and in the U.S. Will need to work with customers at global locations across different time-zonesEDUCATION PREFERRED:B.E. / M.E/MCA (Degree in Electronics/Communication/Electrical Engineering)EXPERIENCE PREFERRED:Minimum 8  years software development experience required as below:Essential Competencies:Strong technical knowledge in relevant area of expertise  Embedded linux & device Drivers, Linux BSP development, Boot loaders(u-boot), inter process communication, and multithreaded applicationsGood C/C   and python programming skills.Experience in following defined software development process, including formal documentation for requirements, test procedures and design, as well as experience in performing code inspections, performance analysis and optimization on embedded applicationsPassionate to learn newer trends and technologies and should be strong in adapting the tools for the sameDesirable Competencies:Embedded working experience on IoT & Cloud connectivityQT/QML, Chromium and WebRTCUnderstanding Cyber SecurityAgile methodology and working knowledge of Atlassian tools.Knowledge about continuous integrationOTHER COMPETENCIES:Understanding of the entire system development process.Strong English communication skills  oral and written.Ability to adapt quickly to an existing, complex environment.Ability to quickly learn new concepts and software is necessary.Passionate about building high-quality systems with software implementation best practices.Working experience in product-based companies.Understanding and responding quickly to customer issues

Job Description
		        DESCRIPTION Amazons technology business is carrying on that tradition while leading the world in Cloud technologies. As a member of the AWS Support team in AWS India, you will be at the forefront of this transformational technology with interactions with leading companies in this space and engineers within Amazon developing the capability. You will be surrounded by people that are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support provides technical support to a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.The AWS India Support team is seeking an experienced Operations or Support Manager based in India to lead a team of 15-20 Support Engineers providing world-class support on all AWS offerings (http://aws.amazon.com/). Our customer facing Support Engineers resolve customers technical issues ranging from general guidance through technical deep-dives identifying and resolving complex configuration and 3rd party integration issues. Support engineers also develop many of their own tools and interact heavily with their peers developing the offerings.Apart from working on a broad spectrum of technical issues, an AWS India Support Manager may also coach/mentor new hires, develop internal and external facing contents, deliver trainings, partner with development teams on complex issues or contact deflection initiatives, participate in new hiring, write tools/script to help the team, or work with leadership on process improvement and strategic initiatives.Our Engineers are also the voice of the customer and have a strong voice into the development teams for recurring issues or feature requests. As we operate on a follow-the-sun model, with Premium Support sites located globally, there is no after hours on-call or mandated overtime in this role!A suitable candidate would be someone who is extremely customer focused, who could multi-task and utilize both written & verbal communication skills to help our diverse range of customers resolve their complex technical issues.A day in the lifeKey expectations of the AWS India Support Manager include: Manage the day-to-day operations of the shift, ensuring the team in India is staffed and SLA commitments are met. Drive personnel management ensuring the engineers have what they need to provide best-in-class support. Participate in Hiring Process to hire and build/grow team of Support Engineers in India. Influence Sr. Support Engineers and development teams to improve the customer support experience. Propose, drive, and implement initiatives within the support organization to maximize the customer support experience. Managing the engineers in the team effectively to keep their focus on the customers as well as develop their own career. Handle escalations and guide engineers to the proper teams by diving deep into the problem. Drives effective business and technical discussions.BASIC QUALIFICATIONS  9  years of experience in technical support, engineering or operations environment 4  of which should be in managing technical teams. Highly motivated and passionate about technology  should have good understanding of the technology that the person is managing. Proven track record of driving improvement programs in the operations, engineering and support fields. BE/B.Tech or equivalent/higher degree preferred. Proven track record of delivering results through people, business and operations management. Hands on experience in one of the technical domains Database OR Big Data (Hadoop and its ecosystem) OR Analytics Strong verbal and written communication skills, which will be key in driving customer communication during AWS critical events.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS  International experience is an added bonus .The Amazon Web Services business requires innovative thinking balanced with a strong customer and quality focus. This leader must have a track record of achieving that balance

Job Description
		        Responsible for end to end process of Patient Care  Medical, Financial, Administrative,Logistic co-ordination.Medical Tourism ID & International Services ID a) In close association with Office Co-ordinator at corporate office MONITOR the exchange of mails between Units (Medical/Doctors/CC Officers, Billing & Managers)b) Interfere in case of clarification, billing escalations and query management  timely responses.Noting Patient Arrival Details  Taking Prior Appointments with the Specialists for the Date of Arrival.Co-ordinating their Medical Evaluation, Treatment Plan and ensuring adherence to the given EstimateConsulting with the Treating Specialists and their team for change of treatment and additional procedures and informing Corporate and respective Managers.Co-ordinating with the Billing team in collecting the Estimate amount & GOPs (credit billing) and convincing duly the patient on extra charges for additional procedures and change of treatment plansPatients and their attendants Care & Complaints: Issues like Food, SIM Cards (Telephone & Communication), Translators, Guest House, Hotels, Forex & petty necessities.FRRO Co-ordination with the Customer Care executives.Translator co-ordination and their attendance regulation in conjunction with respective managers.Cross Selling of Health Packages, Consultations & minor procedures to Patients Attendants.Co-ordination with Customer Care executives for City Tour & tourism, shopping, Change of ticket and departure formalities.Discharge Summaries, DAILY CLINICAL UPDATE reporting & Final Bill copies to be mailed to the Corporate as & when and on a daily basis.

Job Description
		        Company Summary Founded in 2004, NetBrain is the leader in network automation. Its ground-breaking platform provides IT teams with end-to-end visibility into their hybrid network and streamline NetOps workflows through automation. Today, over 2,500 of the worlds largest enterprises and managed services providers leverage NetBrains platform to automate network documentation, troubleshooting, and change management.NetBrains success is due to our people, and over the years, we have been fortunate to attract top talent because of our unique culture and exciting mission to transform the network management industry. - Lingping Gao, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of NetBrainOverview What We NeedNetBrain is looking for a Sales Operations professional in Hyderabad to be the first line of support to our sales team in Europe. The role is a Manager in title and will report to our Vice President of Sales Operations, however this role does not oversee any direct reports. Were looking for someone experienced in Salesforce CPQ who can work across functional teams to understand the insights and intelligence they require understanding, managing, and growing their business, and develop solutions to deliver their requirements at scale.What You'll Do You will work closely with NetBrain's Sales (field and channel), Finance, and Marketing organizations to act as a support agent and apply best practices throughout the business.Help EMEA sales team and other sales operations team members to include business planning, sales strategy, sales compensation, CPQ quoting, reporting, Salesforce Hygiene projects, operational efficiency work streams, etc.Continuously optimize and streamline Salesforce.com processes and workflows to increase sales efficiency and effectiveness.Analyze Salesforce.com data to identify trends, opportunities, and potential areas for improvement.Proactively identify opportunities to streamline processes and improve data quality; Monitor and manage data quality to ensure accuracy and completeness of Salesforce.com records.Critical thinker with the ability to develop innovative solutions with excellent data and analysis skills.Drive weekly (forecast), monthly, and quarterly (QBR) reporting on key metrics such as pipeline, sales trends, quota attainment, sales activities, product usage trends, etc. to sales leaders.Help maintain key fields within SFDC to ensure data integrity to allow for accurate reporting and sales hierarchy.Who You Are 8-10  years Sales Operations experience or similar role; strong understanding of Sales organizations at corporate, field and channel levels.Highly proficient in SDFC and CPQ; can perform minor SFDC admin duties (e.g. establishing user profiles, etc.) generated CPQ quotes independently, and have the ability to generate reports and dashboards.Analytical data driven mindset; problem solver type of personality and at ease operating in a fast-paced environment; strong process orientation.Highly collaborative, loves helping others, and customer   channel focusedExcellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work effectively across departments and levels of the organization.SFDC power user highly desired, with ability to independently build and run reports/ dashboards that cater to business or analytical needs.Strong Microsoft Office skills especially Excel.

Job Description
		        Title: Business Operations Manager (Accessories) Job Description / Responsibility Responsible for Accessories Business Sales (Protection Pro/ Anker / Sound Core Brands) in assigned territory (a state or a part of any state). Responsible to run a territory as an independent profit center. Responsible for appointment of distributors/ DTR Partners in the territory, maintain maximum and most effective width and depth of market. Responsible for appointment of BOEs in the territory to assist to reach your target. Organize training sessions in line with Corporate Trainer. Organize partner engagement activities in the territory. Organize customer feedbacks register (data), check and address complaints, ensure customer satisfaction and ensure ageing follow up. Study the local market trend, reports, analysis and cross function with National Head. Control the partner and installation expert attrition. Monitoring the price sanity in market. Ensure no territory breach is represented to/from the territory. Ensure minimum inventory at each counter and/or at distributor's point. Ensure payment hygiene across the partners in the territory. Ensure no abuse of any marketing material, consumables, freebies, machines, expertise, designs, login credentials etc. Drive the territory within the structured incentive limit. Design, execute, report any local level marketing activities to improve tertiary. Design, execute, report any local level schemes to improve tertiary. Implement nationally rolled out programs in the territory. Check the competition penetration in terms of extended credits or any other appreciative steps. Ensure top quality installations of each film. Travel 10 to 15 days in a month within the territory to bring operational excellence and ensure overall hygiene with improved business. Provide updated market feedback to National Sales Head and discuss scope of improvements. Prepare, share, discuss the sales plans for every month with National Sales Head. Job Nature Full-time Work Place, State Capital Education & Experience Any Degree. 4 to 6 years in Accessories Sales Additional Job Requirements Age, between 30 to 35 years Reporting to National Sales Head Salary & Other Benefits As per Company Policy

Job Description
		        SALES MANAGER / ACCOUNT MANAGERSALES MANAGER / ACCOUNT MANAGER : CLOSED Job Description The company is looking to expand its Business Development - Sales wings to its full swing to address small , medium, large companies and to global and National levels. The role is focussed purely on sales closures and Lead Generation and is suited to people who are sales hungry and who can exploit their exceptional sales skills with effective and successful result. The Person would be directing the sales and marketing cycles with respect to the Industry needs. The persons would be starting in a team and later to work independently on a self managed group. The operational hours are 9:30AM to 630 PM; 5 days a week. The person would be working with Director- Technology and Vice President of NISL.Identify potential customers in the sale zone and develop a business development plan to reach them.Closes new business deals by coordinating requirements; developing and negotiating contracts; integrating contract requirements with business operations.Presenting NISL ( Neer Interactive Solutions pvt Ltd) to potential clients through direct communication in face to face meetings, telephone calls and emails.You will be expected to spend a significant amount of your time out of the office.Responsible for your own lead generation and appointment setting and actively and successfully manage the sales process: lead generation; credentials pitch; asking questions; solution pitch; negotiation; close; handover to the line managers.You will have individual responsibility for new business, and are expected to be autonomous; however, you will be part of a growing team of people with the same job title. You will work in close collaboration with the management team for complex large pitches and strategies.Create and be accountable for all client proposals, contracts and any further documentation, following NISL procedure.Responding to tenders and requests for information in a timely manner.You will effectively interact with other departments including the account management and technical team when handing over campaigns ensuring you fully and correctly brief in all aspects of the sale.Keeping abreast of issues related to open source technologies and collecting competitor intelligence.Ensuring NISL remains proactive and responsive to prospective clients.SKILLS, KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: Proven success in your sales ability and demonstrable full knowledge of the sales process for 2-4 years.Proven knowledge of and experience in sales of IT services.Confident negotiator and ability to close the deal.Capable of hands on problem-solving, with ability to generate ideas and solutions.Ability to work in intimate and transparent collaboration with the project and technical teams.Strong communication skills in all forms including written, oral, email, telephone, and presentation.Language knowledge: proficient in English. Hindi particularly.Strong client management skills and ability to keep promises.A positive and determined approach to researching and analyzing new business opportunities.Ability to use own initiative and pay close attention to detail and Ability to cope with competing demands and to prioritize tasks.Excellent organisational and time management skills.A positive attitude to dealing with people.Capable of working independently, and having responsibility as an individual.A sound understanding of Software Development Life Cycle and ERP would be a distinct advantage.A self- starter who can operate both individually and as part of a team.Excellent presentation and written communication skills.Decent Dressing and Appealing Communications and Presentable personality with , excellent negotiation & persuasive skills.Well-Groomed, Hardworking, Honest , Having Passion for Work, Professional Attitude & Good Personality.Tact and diplomacy will be needed in this role.Roles in the Job Address the clients needs and make a impressive closures.Generate Quality leads that result in sales and Follow up all leads generated.Develop and execute sales/marketing proposals.Make presentations to clients.Build good relationships with potential and existing clients.Work with team to achieve sales performance targets.The Sales accounts include E Governance, Construction, Information Technology, Law Enforcement.

Job Description
		        Job Family DescriptorResponsible for planning for new product/service roll out or enhancement of existing offerings, operations and maintenance in Managed Hosting, Data Centre, Managed Security Services, Infrastructure Managed Services in consultation with the Products, Sales and Engineering teams with the objective of delivering effective solutions to meet customer requirements; minimizing cost of service operations by driving efficiency, scalability, quality and consistency, smooth implementation and minimum downtime of infrastructure. Discuss customer requirement, feasibility and operational aspect of proposed solution and service schedules with Sales Engineering team and analyze internal technical capability to delivery solution. The team conducts financial planning, designs solutions as per customer requirements, drives product engineering, delivery and customer lifecycle management. Develops solution frameworks, methodology and solutioning to drive standardization of repeat solutioning to ensure reduction in operational cost. Also prepares plan for integration with existing platforms and processes, identifies technology partners and outsourced partners for implementation and roll out of product/service, defines service realization and SOPs for Service Delivery and resolves escalated issues. Drive technical deployment planning and implementation including installation of operating system, provisioning, network configuration etc. and monitor implementation success.Broad outline of the RoleContribute as an individual contributor for deployment of customer projects. Monitors and manages service operations and service delivery as per agreed SLA and drives certification and compliance to regulatory requirements. Provides inputs on capacity planning and resources to supervisor for AOP. Liase with engineering team to provide solutions.Engages with customers, project manager and Sales team to understand customer requirement. May lead important projects that require providing experienced project team members with instruction, guidance and advice in all aspects of the project to ensure delivery of quality outcomes. Able to independently resolve complex projects, issues, challenges encountered. Operational role, responsible for delivering results that have direct impact on the achievement of results within the job area and may also impact a wider operational area. Capable of instructing professional or technical staff and reviewing the quality of the work undertaken by these roles.May lead/manage small teams for small projects. Capable of identifying key issues and priorities and focusing on these to deliver required results with minimal direction and supervision. Demonstrate a level of flexibility in resolving problems/issues that at least to in-depth command of all techniques, processes, tools and standards, within the relevant field of specialisation. Able to identify problems and significantly improve, change or adapt existing methods and techniques. Job Description
		        Job DescriptionAre you inspired to contribute your expertise to a global leading Ingredients organization? We are a global leader in taste, scent and nutrition, offering our customers a broader range of solutions for the food & beverage industry.We are looking for a dedicated and passionate individual to join our Cash Application team as Internal Controls Specialist. Come join the global Ingredients leader where science and creativity meet to create essential solutions for a better world!Your FocusAs Internal Controls Specialist based out of our Finance Shared Service Center in Hyderabad, India, you will be responsible for effective and efficient performance of the Reporting team. You will distribute accurate and timely reporting, metrics and internal control reports as needed for the function globally.The role will report to AR & Credit Operations Manager.How You Will ContributeEstablish reporting requirements and expectations with stakeholders, working with them to identify any issues or concerns and develop solutions to address them.Define metrics and KPIs to be tracked and reported on a regular basis.Ensure accuracy and completeness of the data used for reporting.Develop and distributes reports to stakeholders in a timely and efficient manner.Ensure compliance with internal controls framework and regulatory requirements.Investigate and reports any internal control breaches or issues.Reconcile accounts and transactions on a regular basis, establishing and maintaining a reconciliation process to ensure accuracy and completeness of financial data.Provide accurate and timely reports on reconciliation results to stakeholders, developing solutions to resolve any reconciliation issue.Identify opportunities and recommends improvements, focusing on efficiency, productivity & quality.Job RequirementsWhat you will need to be successfulBachelors degree in Accounting/Finance, MBA or any other relevant discipline.Atleast 4  6 years of experience AR, credit, finance and/or accounting.Solid understanding of the systems used in the various sub-processesStrong understanding and focus on internal controls requirements.Proven expertise with SAP is a must.Strong customer focus skills.Lean / Six Sigma Certification is considered a plus.Well versed with Microsoft applications (Word, Excel, Powerpoint).Ability to effectively influence and motivate othersExcellent verbal and written communication skills.Ability to deal with ambiguity and a changing environment.

Job Description
		        DESCRIPTION At Amazon, we're working to be the most customer-centric company on earth. To get there, we need exceptionally talented, bright and driven people. Amazon is one of the most recognizable brand names in the world and we distribute millions of products each year to our loyal customersAmazon is seeking Operation Manager for its Transportation team.In this role you will be responsible for Setting up the sortation centers in the region which includes identifying & setting up sites to ensure rapid expansions & growth in the region.Essential FunctionsDefining, building and responsible for the execution of transportation processes, right from Fulfillment centers to sortation hubs and further to the last mile Delivery center network.Responsible for Hiring, training and building up a highly motivated workforce for sort hubs with support from HR and training team , to meet the operational requirements for the city , continuously meeting the high bar on quality and productivity.Ensure enough bandwidth in these sites for peak time volume management.Coordinate with Finance, CS, FC and Projects team to matters related to city operations.Conduct the performance appraisals of the team members and mentor them for handling efficient operations.Continuously improve the defined processes and attain a sustained performance standard. Initiates improvements to enhance quality standards, reduce waste, and eliminate unnecessary work.Analysis of the data reports to identify performance bottlenecks and improve the performance.Implement the formal process control and process improvement mechanisms such as KaizenEssential SkillsStrong leadership capabilities and people management skillsAbility to work under pressure situationsAbility to work in ambiguous situations.Good communication skills. Ability to communicate and explain to individuals & the team, what needs to be done to achieve its objectives. Listening skills: Gains input and commitment from all involved in delivering their specific part.Ability to set and achieve timelines for tasks: Set realistic and stretching performance expectations for self and others. Regularly reviews progress and acts to ensure optimal results for the business.Strong Bias for great customer service: Engage the Team in developing their understanding of Customer Experience and knowledge of what Customers actually needs/expects.High Ownership: Follows through to ensure the delivery of changes/solutions/services that fulfill the Customers needs.Analytical Skills: Effectively analyses and interpret information, identifying & validating the key facts, including reviewing alternatives to determine advantages and associated risks.Understands line haul management.BASIC QUALIFICATIONS1  years of employee and performance management experienceBachelor's degreeWork a flexible schedule/shift/work area, including weekends, nights, and/or holidaysCan push and pull wheeled dollies loaded with products up to 100 pounds during shiftsPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS1  years of performance metrics, process improvement or lean techniques experience

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
		        for educational equityWhat Teach For India Can Offer You The opportunity to be part of one of the most established and visionary movements in the education sector in India which is at a pivotal point in terms of expanding its scale and outreach across the nation and working with changemakers across the country.A challenging yet flexible workplace in which every individual employees Staff journey is tracked for excellence and leadership development.A work environment in which employees holistic well-being is a core priority, enabling people to be their best selves.Access to connections and resources from the global Teach For All network that includes partner organizations spanning 50  countries across 6 continents.Remuneration that is competitive within the top quartile of the Indian NGO pay scales, and a benefits package that includes extensive medical insurance and maternity coverage for both parents.Position SummaryReporting to: Senior Manager, Development and OperationsDirectly Managing: Associate, Development OperationsThe Development Operations Manager, will report directly to the Senior Manager, Development and Operations, and will be responsible for the overall operations of the Development team to ensure the team is efficiently delivering its internal and external deliverables.Team OverviewTeach For India embarks on a bold vision in our Phase 4 (2022-32), 50,000 Fellow and Alumni, along with our children will be on the path to developing their own leadership and working towards educational equity in India. We aim to transform the lives of 1 in every 10 children in India. This ambitious growth needs to be supported by financial resources, which the Development team will help secure, in addition to building partnerships that go beyond providing only financial support to fuel this growth.The Mission of the Development team is to build lifelong champions of the cause and to acquire financial support for the movement. As one of the most external-facing teams, we build high-impact sustainable partnerships and strong champions for the movement through various engagement avenues and immersions with our students, Fellows, Staff, and our Board. The Development team has repurposed fundraising efforts by building strategic partnerships, newer channels of giving, and strong teams and systems resilient to future threats.Development is one of the critical backbones of the organizations as the organization is completely dependent on donations in its current form. The team raises funds from various sources - CSR will continue to be our mainstay for the immediate and medium-term. We are also cultivating Foundations, HNI, retail fundraising as medium-term priorities.Additionally, we are building our capacity in the Multilateral and Impact Investing space by engaging with organisations such as USAID, UNICEF, and the likes. Over the past year, we have also piloted online campaigns, and are looking to continue with such campaigns on a yearly basis.The opportunity - whats in it for you:Being a team that works mostly with external stakeholders, our work takes us through a huge learning curve both professionally and personally on relationship management strategies. We work directly with the Senior Leadership and Board of TFI and our partners are the finest in their respective sectors. The skillsets - communication, building relationships, budgeting, data analysis, and representation, comfort with systems like Salesforce, etc. - acquired in the role are transferable skills in any domain/sector or for higher education.ResponsibilitiesResponsibilities include:Act both as an advisor and an auditor to ensure quality control and push the bar of excellence in all development-related systems and processes.Liaise with key verticals  Finance, Technology, Recruitment, Strategy and Impact, Communications, Training and Impact, and Cities to streamline development requirements.Project management, planning and implementation/refining of new and existing processes to solve for challenges faced by the Development team.Be updated and bring in perspectives/best practices from external agencies and organisations for the Development teams ways of working.Specific responsibilities include:Finance:Monitor and support annual organisation planning and budgeting.Implement costing strategy and packaging of budget for programs.Manage monthly Cash-flow projections for upwards of 100 Cr budget.Analyse quarterly expenses, vertical-wise forecasting, and managing Donor Fund Utilization projections.Liaise with the Finance and Technology teams to implement systems to optimise delivery of development-related financial requirements.Salesforce:Track fundraising goals and projections.Track funded and unfunded projects against the budget.Manage processes on Salesforce to reconcile budgets and income.Train the team on Salesforce SOPs and and drive rigorous and efficient usage of SalesforceDeliver insightful and data-driven quarterly reporting to Leadership and Board.Liaise with the Technology team to design and implement changes to optimise Salesforce for development requirements.Regulatory Compliance:Own Grant Management manual for auditory requirements, policy, and operational purposes.Maintain and manage the Knowledge Management System for Development.Maintenance of Income-Expense tracker to adhere to the latest CSR and FCRA compliancesOversee Donor MOU processing, MOU checklist, and indemnity tracker management.Audit:Coordinate and oversee donor audit deliverables (both programmatic and financial) to stay compliant with Donor mandates and MOU commitments.Implement Donor audit feedback learning loop for appropriate verticals - Finance, Technology, Strategy and Learning, Communications, Training and Impact, and Cities.Undertake internal audit on processes and systems followed by the Development team.As a Development Team member, you will need toPartner with other Vertical Heads and teams (e.g. Recruitment, Alumni, HR, Training & Impact) to stay abreast of all key programs and updates.Work closely with the Director, Development for planning and strategizing yearly fundraising goals and operations plan, team hiring and stepbacks.

Job_title: Python Developer,Python Developer Fresher Urgent Hiring
Location: location_on Bengaluru/ Bangalore (Karnataka), Chennai (Tamil Nadu), Delhi/ NCR (Delhi), Hyderabad/ Secunderabad (Andhra Pradesh), Mumbai (Maharashtra)
Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Responsibilities:
• Develop complex software products that include scale, algorithmic complexity, and a huge amount of data.
• Build cutting-edge scalable systems by writing simple and efficient code.
• Code, develop, design, and architect features related to the existing application. We expect you to own modules end to end and take pride in the work products you ship
• Contribute to all aspects of an agile software development lifecycle including design, architecture, development, documentation, testing, and operations.
• Design, implement, and maintain highly scalable, multi-tier, distributed server software applications
• Deliver across the entire app life cycle, design, build, deploy, test, release to app stores, and support
• Working directly with developers and product managers to conceptualize, build, test, and release products
• Take responsibility for performance and stability for all server functions
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

Job Description
		        Minimum of 3 yrs hands-on experience in Python programming and proficiency in Python syntax, data structures, and control flow.Expertise with Python libraries and frameworks such as NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib, Requests, Django, or Flask.Experience with Unit testing using PytestUnderstanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and experience in building modular and reusable code.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to break down complex problems into manageable tasks.Familiarity with web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and frameworks.Experience in data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using Python.Knowledge of software development best practices, including version control and testing.Excellent debugging and troubleshooting skills to identify and resolve issues.Strong collaboration and communication skills to work effectively within a team.Experience with scikit-learn is a plusBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).Roles & Responsibilities:Develop, test, and maintain Python applications, modules, and libraries.Write clean, efficient, and scalable code using Python and adhere to coding standards.Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers to develop and deploy software solutions.Troubleshoot and debug code issues, identify root causes and implement effective solutions.Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and maintainability.Optimize code and performance to deliver efficient and responsive software.Integrate Python applications with other systems and technologies.Maintain documentation for code, APIs, and processes.Stay updated with emerging Python technologies, libraries, and best practices.Continuously improve coding skills and contribute to the growth of the development team.Experience: 3-6 Years

Job Description
		        Minimum of 3 yrs hands-on experience in Python programming and proficiency in Python syntax, data structures, and control flow.Expertise with Python libraries and frameworks such as NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib, Requests, Django, or Flask.Experience with Unit testing using PytestUnderstanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and experience in building modular and reusable code.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to break down complex problems into manageable tasks.Familiarity with web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and frameworks.Experience in data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using Python.Knowledge of software development best practices, including version control and testing.Excellent debugging and troubleshooting skills to identify and resolve issues.Strong collaboration and communication skills to work effectively within a team.Experience with scikit-learn is a plusBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).Roles & Responsibilities:Develop, test, and maintain Python applications, modules, and libraries.Write clean, efficient, and scalable code using Python and adhere to coding standards.Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers to develop and deploy software solutions.Troubleshoot and debug code issues, identify root causes and implement effective solutions.Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and maintainability.Optimize code and performance to deliver efficient and responsive software.Integrate Python applications with other systems and technologies.Maintain documentation for code, APIs, and processes.Stay updated with emerging Python technologies, libraries, and best practices.Continuously improve coding skills and contribute to the growth of the development team.Experience: 3-6 Years

Job Description
		        Must have skills Experience in Python programming language and wxPython GUI tool kit.Knowledge in C and C   programming languages.Knowledge about UNIX operating system.Good knowledge of database (MySQL, SQLite).Ability to learn and understand the new technologies and open source softwares.Must have self-learning experience, with minimal supervision.Should have good communication skills and good team player.Good to have skills Knowledge in GIS and Image processing.Basic concepts of Grass GIS framework.Work Experience 1 to 3 years of experience in Python development.Please send you resume to careers@magnarus.com with job id and title in the subject

Job Description
		        Experience in web application development using Python, Django/Flask.Proficient in developing REST APIs, and familiar with JSON formatted data.Good understanding of front-end frameworks like Vue.js/Angular/React.jsWriting high quality code with best practices based on technical requirement.Hands-on experience in analysis, design, coding, and implementation of complex, custom-built software products.Experience in working with Git or equivalent code management / version control system with best practices.Good to have knowledge in AWS, Docker.Should have interest to explore and work on Cyber Security domain.Experience with Agile development methods.Should have strong analytical and logical skills.Should be good at fundamentals: Data Structures, Algorithms, Programming Languages, Distributed Systems, and Information retrieval.Should have good communication skills and client facing experience.

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
		        Experience: 4  YearsThe key aspects of this role include:Design, build, and maintain scalable applications using Python.Contribute to the entire implementation process including driving the definition of improvements based on business need and architectural improvements.Act as a subject matter expert for Application Software developers and Engineers.Handle server-side code for a production platform and contribute to new featuresTo be the right fit, you'll need:More than 4  years of experience as a software developer in Python, with knowledge of at least one Python web framework such as Django, Flask, etc.Good understanding of common design patterns and architecture principles to design reliable and Scalable applicationsStrong communication skillsKnowledge of databases line NoSQL or MongoDBGood to have AWS and Docker or Web servicesBasic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3

Job Description
		        Description Responsible for full-stack technical development of platform and modules using DevOps methodologyDemonstrated experience building robust, resilient platforms using Python-Flask, Django or similar Node / Java frameworks (ideally in an Azure / Docker environment), architecture and integration.Demonstrated knowledge using version control systems (e.g. Git, VSTS, SVN, etc.) and working in CI / CD environmentsDatabase modelling, design and implementation experience. E.g. SQL, PostgreSQL experience.Data management experience with Azure Cloud strongly preferredDeep, hands-on technical expertise in building complex distributed system architectures and designing, implementing, and scaling application platforms.Experience developing REST APIs and data integration experience, including ETL to communicate with other systemsProficiency in Linux, Database/SQL/NOSQL and caching experience.Computer/Electrical/Software Engineering or Computer Science educational background requiredExperience with various types of data sources in Oil & Gas including real-time systems such as PI, Geographic Information Systems such as ArcGIS, Production & Well management systems, ERP systems such as SAP, etc. (optional)

Job_desc_raw:
Job Description
Special Note: Please Apply through the below Link
https://rdpdotin/jobs/detail/senior-python-odoo-developer-260


We are looking for an experienced and talented Senior Odoo/Python Developer to join our IT company. As a Senior Odoo/Python Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality software applications using the Odoo and Python frameworks.

In this role, you will be involved in all stages of the software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering and design to coding, testing, and deployment. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions that meet the needs of our customers.

The ideal candidate for this position will have a strong background in software development, with extensive experience in developing applications using Odoo and Python. You should be a creative problem-solver with excellent analytical and communication skills, as well as the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.

If you are passionate about technology and have a desire to work on challenging and innovative software projects, then we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.


Special Note: Please Apply through the below Link
https://rdpdotin/jobs/detail/senior-python-odoo-developer-260


Responsibilities:

Design and develop software applications using the Odoo and Python frameworks, adhering to best practices and coding standards.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Develop custom modules and integrations within the Odoo platform to meet the needs of customers.
Participate in code reviews and ensure that code quality is maintained at a high standard.
Troubleshoot and debug issues that arise during development and testing.
Write and maintain technical documentation to support the software development lifecycle.
Stay up-to-date with the latest developments and trends in Odoo and Python development, and apply them to improve the software development process.
Mentor and train junior developers, providing guidance and support as needed.
Collaborate with project managers to ensure that software projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards.
Participate in Agile development processes, including sprint planning, daily stand-up meetings, and sprint retrospectives, to continuously improve the software development process.



Special Note: Please Apply through the below Link
https://rdpdotin/jobs/detail/senior-python-odoo-developer-260


Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
At least 5 years of experience in software development, with a focus on developing applications using Odoo and Python.
Strong understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and design patterns.
Extensive experience with the Odoo framework, including custom module development and integration.
Strong knowledge of Python programming language and related libraries.
Experience with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or Oracle.
Familiarity with web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
Understanding of software development methodologies such as Agile and Waterfall.
Experience with version control systems such as Git or SVN.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to work independently or as part of a team.



Special Note: Please Apply through the below Link
https://rdpdotin/jobs/detail/senior-python-odoo-developer-260


Compensation/Benefits:
1.Salary - Best in the Industry.
2.Incentive - Best in the Industry.
3.Medical Policy for the Candidate and Family.
4.Career Growth.

Job Description
		        Job DescriptionVerisk Maplecroft are looking to hire an experienced Python/Django developer who is passionate about delivering high quality, standards driven software solutions and who embraces the challenges presented by the ever-changing landscape of web development. This role will be part of a multi-disciplinary team spanning the UK and India offices, working primarily on the back-end of our client facing web application (GRiD), and involved in all areas of the software development life cycle.As a member of the back-end team, you will be empowered to help drive both technical and user-focused improvements to our products and the wider ecosystem.Our back-end/API uses Django and Celery, and our front-end user interface is a single page web application powered by Angular. You will be required to have a deep understanding of Django and be excited by the prospect of scaling up our apps to cope with increasing demand as we explore new ways of working with our highly rich risk data.The role will require the Python/Django developer to:Work as part of an Agile feature team in requirements gathering, refinement and delivery of user focused improvements to the GRiD platformDeliver high quality, maintainable and well tested code which meets stakeholder requirementsPeer review other developers work in a thorough and constructive mannerWork collaboratively with other Developers, Project Owners, UX designers and QA engineers to deliver high quality solutionsLook for and drive opportunities to improve code quality, development processes and team satisfactionQualificationsRequire:Expert knowledge of Python, with a minimum of 3 years experience as a Python developer in a commercial software development roleMinimum of 2 years experience working with the Django framework in a commercial software development roleHighly experienced in REST APIs, both in authoring and consumingComfortable working within DockerStrong level of experience in PostGReSQL and database developmentGood understanding of git workflows and working collaboratively on team-level codeFluency and clarity in spoken and written English, being able to concisely communicate technical ideas internally and to UK/US staffNice to have:Postman experienceJira experience
